T11dhnyabpu:14: sarva eva hi viśiṣṭo janaḥ śāstrārambhe sveṣṭhadevatāstutiṃ kṛtavān /
T11dhnyabpu:18: śrotṛṇāṃ stutipuraḥsarayā pravṛttyā puṇyātiśayotpādanāt pārārthya cālocya buddhasya bhagavataḥ stutimārabdhavān- jayantītyādi /
T11dhnyabpu:19: anena ślokena buddhasya bhagavata eva pūjā stotrataḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:21: stotramapi sva- parārthasampattyai sambhāvtīti pūrva svārthasampada bhagavatī darsahyati jayanti jātivyasanetyādinā sugataparyantenaḥ manastamastānabetyādinā parārthasampadam /
T11dhnyabpu:33: 'samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapruṣārthasiddhiriti tadvayutpādayate' iti prathamavākyenāsya prakaraṇasya sambandha-prayojana-abhiveyāni,
T11dhnyabpu:35: tathā hi sambandha prayojana abhidheyānāmabhāve prakaraṇaśāstrarmadaṃ prekṣāpūrva[dha] samyagjñānapūrviketyādinā asya prakaraṇasyābhidheya- prayojanamucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:42: sa ādiryeṣāṃ dveṣādīnāṃ te rāgādayo bhavanti kleśāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:72: tama iti kṛtvā na gamatayā tamo 'ndhakārī dhaṭādipratibandhaṃ karoti /
T11dhnyabpu:76: ṣaṣṭhī- samāso vā vacana pramātho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:77: manastamastānavamādadhānāḥ=tanutvaṃ kurvāṇāḥ sakalajanasya śruticintābhāvanākrameṇa sugatasya vācaḥ sutra abhidharma vinayasvabhāvāḥ jayanti
T11dhnyabpu:79: yasmād bhagavatpravacane pramāṇaparicinna upāyo vimukti lakṣaṇaśca upāyo nirdiśyate,
T11dhnyabpu:80: teṣāṃ cāgama upāyopeyayoḥ pramāṇarahitatvāt tato bhagavata eva vāco jayanti,
T11dhnyabpu:89: tatra tad vyutpādayate ityanena abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ ca sākṣādukte /
T11dhnyabpu:91: etacca tatra sāmarthyam- samyagjñānapratipādanārtha prakaraṇārambhād arthād prakaraṇamupāya eveti darśitam anyathā yadi upāyo na syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:96: tacca vyutpattayātmakaṃ samyagjñānapratipādanamanena kriyata iti prakaraṇamidaṃ tasyārthasya sādhanaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:102: sa ca sādhya sādhanalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇa eva /
T11dhnyabpu:115: tatrāyaṃ vākyārthaḥ- yasmāt sarvapuruṣārtha dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram- śabdaḥ arthaśca /
T11dhnyabpu:120: sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ yena syāt prayojana prayojanam,
T11dhnyabpu:121: tena ca prayojana prayojanamākhyātamiti dūṣitam sāmarthyāt /
T11dhnyabpu:125: yato dvividhaṃ prakaraṇasya śarīraṃ prakaraṇasya svabhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:145: iṣṭaśca prakaraṇārambhaḥ sautrāntikaḥ yogācārobhayanayānu abhidheyaṃ tu yadi nipprayojanaṃ syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:147: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā /
T11dhnyabpu:151: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samaygjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanamuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:153: tathā hi- 'puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyamanena prakaraṇena' iti bruvatā samyagjñānamaraya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
T11dhnyabpu:160: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sākṣāt sāmarthyād darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:167: nanu ca yatrābhidheyaprayojanaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttāvaṅga tathā samvandhādīnyapi,
T11dhnyabpu:170: asminnabhidheyaprayojane kathite tānyapi sāmarthyāt kathitāni bhavantītyarhtaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:179: na caikena vākyenārthatrayaṃ sākṣāchakyate darśayitumiti darśayati- na tvidamityādi /
T11dhnyabpu:180: ekaṃ tvittyādivākyaṃ prādhānyenaikaṃ vadadabhidheyavyutpattiprayojanasambandhārthatrayaṃ pratipadayati tatra tadityādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:194: sarva iti sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭa laukika lokottara heyopādeyopekṣaṇīyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:202: strak candana vasanāśana tatra tad ityābhidheyam,
T11dhnyabpu:206: tathā hi- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanamanviṣya pravartante /
T11dhnyabpu:210: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānāmātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartu prakaraṇamidaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:211: śiṣyaiścācāryaprayuktāmātmano vyutpattimiccadbhiḥ prakaraṇamidaṃ śrūyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇa śravaṇayo prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
T11dhnyabpu:214: vyutpattiḥ kriyata ityevaṃ yujyate vaktum kimiti atdvayutpādyate iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti /
T11dhnyabpu:217: vakturiti śāstrakartu śrotuśca prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ vintyate /
T11dhnyabpu:218: yasmād dvayorapi vaktṛśrotrostatra prakaraṇe prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇāsyo vyāpārau staḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:222: yasmādanena samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayate ityatra vākye vyutpattikriyāniṣpattau karaṇaśravaṇakriyādvayakartavyatayā praviṣṭam /
T11dhnyabpu:223: tacca vyutpattikaraṇa śāstrakārasyaiva nānyasyeti ṇicā nidarśitam /
T11dhnyabpu:224: yasmāt samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādyamānān śiṣyān prerayati- vyutpāditaṃ samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyadhvam iti /
T11dhnyabpu:229: tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:231: yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:232: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
T11dhnyabpu:234: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:236: yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:239: tathāhi- pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati puṣpamālyādikamādatte,
T11dhnyabpu:241: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti /
T11dhnyabpu:242: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante,
T11dhnyabpu:244: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante /
T11dhnyabpu:252: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam /
T11dhnyabpu:253: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam?
T11dhnyabpu:255: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam /
T11dhnyabpu:257: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:261: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:264: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇāt prāgvartate śāstram,
T11dhnyabpu:274: yo hi samaygjñānārthī sa tathābhutaṃ śāstrakartu rādivākyaṃ śrutvātatra saṃśete,
T11dhnyabpu:281: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam /
T11dhnyabpu:282: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate /
T11dhnyabpu:283: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:293: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
T11dhnyabpu:296: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:299: tena yaduktaṃ kenacid- 'vyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti,
T11dhnyabpu:301: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:303: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena?
T11dhnyabpu:311: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate,
T11dhnyabpu:314: ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyasāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:315: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha- avisaṃvādakamityādi /
T11dhnyabpu:316: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam,
T11dhnyabpu:318: athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena,
T11dhnyabpu:330: tathā hi- na jñānaṃ janayad artha prāpayati,
T11dhnyabpu:333: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:337: tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:342: tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam /
T11dhnyabpu:344: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:346: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa,
T11dhnyabpu:349: pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam,
T11dhnyabpu:356: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
T11dhnyabpu:368: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:370: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam,
T11dhnyabpu:375: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti /
T11dhnyabpu:376: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt /
T11dhnyabpu:379: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:388: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:389: yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:392: na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:399: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra yo 'rtha ityādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:404: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:407: tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:408: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:411: yathā atratyo dhūmo vahnijaḥ iti jānam /
T11dhnyabpu:413: anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti /
T11dhnyabpu:414: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati /
T11dhnyabpu:415: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni /
T11dhnyabpu:420: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake,
T11dhnyabpu:422: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:425: bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:436: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha /
T11dhnyabpu:437: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau /
T11dhnyabpu:438: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam
T11dhnyabpu:439: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
T11dhnyabpu:440: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati?
T11dhnyabpu:447: evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate,
T11dhnyabpu:448: yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam,
T11dhnyabpu:450: tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam,
T11dhnyabpu:452: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam /
T11dhnyabpu:453: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:462: ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum?
T11dhnyabpu:463: nocyate- yasminneva kāle pariccidayate tasminneva kāle prāpayitavyamiti,
T11dhnyabpu:466: kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam /
T11dhnyabpu:470: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta /
T11dhnyabpu:484: evaṃ manyate- ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñjikāvivarasthasya maṇairniyatadeśasya,
T11dhnyabpu:492: evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvāda bhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam,
T11dhnyabpu:495: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:498: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:500: tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena,
T11dhnyabpu:503: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:515: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam /
T11dhnyabpu:518: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:521: tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:529: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:542: tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:548: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham /
T11dhnyabpu:555: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:558: taccāyuktam yasmādarthasya dārupākāderna samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi?
T11dhnyabpu:559: svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:561: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti /
T11dhnyabpu:575: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti /
T11dhnyabpu:580: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato 'rthasiddhiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:582: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam /
T11dhnyabpu:583: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti,
T11dhnyabpu:586: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi /
T11dhnyabpu:589: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
T11dhnyabpu:611: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā bhavatīti darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:624: jñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ tasmāt tat samyagjñānaṃ vyupādayate /
T11dhnyabpu:630: caturvidhā cātra vipratipattiḥ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa gocara phalaviṣayā /
T11dhnyabpu:635: tasyāḥ prādhānyāt taccabdena sambandho yukto na samyagjñanasya?
T11dhnyabpu:637: evaṃ manyate- śabdārthī hi dvividhaḥ śābdaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:655: evaṃ manyate- vipratipattinirākaraṇadvāreṇa samyagjñānasvarūpaṃ jñāpyate 'nena prakaraṇeneti // 1 //
T11dhnyabpu:672: tasmāt tādṛśavipratipatticatuṣṭhayanirākaraṇena srvathā abhāntatayā samyagjñanasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:673: tatra ca prathamameva saṅkhayāvipratipattinirākaraṇārthamuktam- dvividhaṃ samyagjñānamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:679: vyaktibhede ca pradarśite prativyaktiniyataṃ samyagjñānalakṣaṇamākhyātuṃ śakyam /
T11dhnyabpu:680: apradarśite tu vyaktibhede sakalavyaktyanuyāyi samyagjñānalakṣaṇamekaṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum /
T11dhnyabpu:682: apradarśite tu vyaktibhedātmake saṃkhyāhede lakṣaṇabhedasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:688: prāptāpannālaṅgatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgapratiṣedhāt abhidheyavalliṅge sati sarvaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:689: nanu ca samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇe kathite sati paścāt tadbhedaḥ pradarśayitu yujyate- ityambhutalakṣaṇaṃ samyagjñānaṃ dvividhamiti,
T11dhnyabpu:693: kintvatra saṃkhyābhede 'kathite samyagjñānasya lakṣaṇameva na śakyate kathayitum,
T11dhnyabpu:694: ataḥ pratyakṣasyānyallakṣaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ śakyate kathayitumityato lakṣaṇāṅgamevādau saṃkhyābhedakathanamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:695: nanu ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti nirdeśād dvividhamiti labdham,
T11dhnyabpu:699: asati dvitvakathane pratyakṣānumāne tāvat sambhavati'nyānyapi pramāṇāni bhaviṣyantīti syādāśaṅkā // 2 //
T11dhnyabpu:714: tathātrāpi indriyāśritatvena jñānaviṣayasya pratyakṣakārakatvasūcanāt pratyakṣacatuṣṭhayameva pratyakṣatvenāśrīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:723: tadeva śabdasya pravṛttinimittam tataścayatkiñcidarśasya sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:727: yathā gaccatoti gauḥ iti gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdo gamanakriyopalakṣitamekārthasamavetaṃ gotvaṃpravṛttinimittī karoti /
T11dhnyabpu:728: yathā ca gaccatyagaccati ca gavi gośabdaḥ siddho bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:733: smṛte ca sādhyasādhanasambandhe 'numānaṃ pravartate iti paścātkālabhāvi ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:736: pratyakṣo ghaṭaiti na syātḥ idameva syātpratyakṣājñānam,
T11dhnyabpu:739: nanu ca pratigatamakṣamityasyāṃ vyutpattāvakṣāśritasyaividnriyajñanasya pratyakṣaśabdavācyatā syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:747: apapi paścānmānamanumānamityavyayībhāvasamāse pūrvaccodayamudbhāvya gatisamāsa āśrayitavyaḥ- anugataṃ mānamanumānamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:756: yathā pratyakṣāmarthenotpannaṃ sad abhrāntamiti pramāṇaṃ bhavativ tathānumānamapi tādātmyadutpattibhyāmarthapratibandhādabhrāntamiti tat pramāṇaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:757: etena yaduvata kaiścit- sarveṣu pramāṇeṣu mukhyaṃ pratyakṣam iti tannirastam /
T11dhnyabpu:764: tena kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ yad bhavati tadeva pratyakṣaṃ viditavyam ityartha ukto bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:769: tato 'yaṃ vākyārthaḥ- tatra tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoriti samudāyanirdeśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:771: cakāraḥ pratyakṣānumānayostulyavalatvaṃ samuccinotītyādinā yaduvataṃ śabarasvāmiprabhṛtibhiḥ- pratyakṣaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nānumānam,
T11dhnyabpu:772: tathā coktaṃ mīsāṃsābhāsye- pratyakṣe valīyasi kathamanumānam iti tat prayuktam yato dvayorapi svavyāpāre tulyabalatbam /
T11dhnyabpu:775: tābhyāmevaṃ vyākhyātam- pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca iti bhinnavibhaktinirdeśo 'rthād viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:778: etaccāyuktam yasmād ekavibhaktinirdeśe kriyamāṇe cakāreṇa tulyabalatvaṃ na pradarśitaṃ syāditi // 3 //
T11dhnyabpu:783: anena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyākhyānaṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandharūpaṃ pratyuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:786: yadayapyanvarthasaṃjñayā kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yadbhrāntaṃ ca tatpratyakṣamiti śakyate yathārtha kathayitum,
T11dhnyabpu:787: tathāpi na svarūpaṃ pratyakṣasya kathitaṃ syat,
T11dhnyabpu:788: yato 'nyadapi pratyakṣasya svarūpamartha avayavārthastu- kalpanābhya apoḍhamiti kalpanāpoḍham /
T11dhnyabpu:801: yat tad bhavatām asmākaṃ cārtheṣu sākṣātkāri jñāni prasiddham,
T11dhnyabpu:804: kimanyat pratyakṣasya jñānasya rūpamavaśiṣyate yat pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ sad anūdyeteti,
T11dhnyabpu:805: yasmādindriyānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyartheṣu sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ pratyakṣaśabda vācyaṃ sarveṣāṃ prasiddham,
T11dhnyabpu:808: lakṣyalakṣaṇetukathite yathārtha kathitaṃ bhavati yat kiñcit pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhābhrāntamiti pratipattavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:812: na cānityatvaṃ saṃjñeti gamyata iti saṃjñā lakṣaṇakaraṇayorbhedaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:814: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate,
T11dhnyabpu:816: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate,
T11dhnyabpu:817: aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti /
T11dhnyabpu:819: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:820: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:822: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate?
T11dhnyabpu:824: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham,
T11dhnyabpu:834: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham /
T11dhnyabpu:841: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:842: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
T11dhnyabpu:848: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:850: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti /
T11dhnyabpu:851: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā /
T11dhnyabpu:852: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:853: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham /
T11dhnyabpu:855: ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:856: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam,
T11dhnyabpu:861: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati?
T11dhnyabpu:864: api tvarthakriyākṣame vasturūpa ālamabane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:867: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamḥ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:883: tato yaddeśo gaccad vṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ taddeśo nāvāpyate /
T11dhnyabpu:884: yaddeśaścāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti tasmāt kaścidartho 'vāpyate /
T11dhnyabpu:888: tathā hi momāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajamḥ upadarśitasyārthasya prāpaṇāt / tathā cāha-
T11dhnyabpu:893: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī //
T11dhnyabpu:894: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamadṛte /
T11dhnyabpu:896: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate /
T11dhnyabpu:897: tathā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe 'grahaṇamatiricyamāna dvicandrajñānādeḥsamyagjñānādhikaraṇa eva nirastatvād vipratipattinirāsārthatvameva bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:899: gaccadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamiccantiḥ vastuno 'bhrāntatvāt pītākārādeśca bhrāntatvāda- ityasti vipratipatti,
T11dhnyabpu:901: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaviṣayasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:913: abhilapyate 'neneti abhilāpaḥ=vācyaḥ tathā abhrāntagrahaṇenāpyanumāne nivartite kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
T11dhnyabpu:915: pratyakṣaṃ tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam /
T11dhnyabpu:916: na tvavisaṃvādakamabhrāntimiha grahītavyam yataḥ samyagjñānameva pratyakṣam, nānyat /
T11dhnyabpu:918: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt- pratyakṣākhyaṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhamavisaṃvādakaṃ ceti /
T11dhnyabpu:920: tasmād grāhya'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yadaviparyastaṃ tadabhrāntamiha veditavyam / // 4 //
T11dhnyabpu:925: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ= ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha ghrāhyākāratayā milanam /
T11dhnyabpu:926: tato yadaikasmin jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayorākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrāntagrahaṇenetyādinā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇadya vipratipattinirāsārthatvaṃ darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:929: tasyārthasma grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati- na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā // 4 //
T11dhnyabpu:930: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyā grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajānan pṛccati /
T11dhnyabpu:931: tathā hi- vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarka vicāra caitasikasamprayuktaṃ kalpanāmiccanti /
T11dhnyabpu:932: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grahyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā /
T11dhnyabpu:934: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:942: tadeva hi anvayavyatirekavattvād vyāptatvād abhilāpayituṃ śakyam /
T11dhnyabpu:944: abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogyo 'bhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathoktā /
T11dhnyabpu:946: yathā- vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭārthakalpanā ghaṭaśabdasaṃsṛṣṭārthāvabhāsā bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:947: kācittu abhilāpenāsaṃsṛṣṭāpi abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā- bālakasyāvyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā /
T11dhnyabpu:948: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ityuktāvavyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
T11dhnyabpu:950: yadayapi abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
T11dhnyabpu:954: sāmānyadi tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā- abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ= vācyaḥ sāmānyādiḥ ityevaṃrūpā /
T11dhnyabpu:956: anyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi /
T11dhnyabpu:957: yadayevam, dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācakasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt?
T11dhnyabpu:959: viṣayacintāyāṃ sāmānyādeviṣayabhāvakathanena sāmarthyāt kathitaṃ bhavatīti nirodhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:961: nanu ca yadayapi tasmin jñāne ākārayormīlanaṃ tathapi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāsti?
T11dhnyabpu:964: tatra kācit pratītirityādinā yogyagrahaṇasya viṣayaṃ darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:966: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadayogyatvamapi nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:969: mūkādijñāne tu saṃketābhāve sati śabdaratibhāso 'pi na sambhavatīti sasargayogyatvamapi nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:980: yadvā- na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ= abhidherya yadarthasāmānyam /
T11dhnyabpu:986: jñāne 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyo yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa evābhilāpa asatyabhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatāvasitiḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:989: grahyo hyartho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
T11dhnyabpu:995: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa evāyam iti pūrvaduṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvannoparatarudito mukhamarpayati stane /
T11dhnyabpu:1001: tataśca vyāavarttyābhavāda yogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:1014: tathā niyatapratibhāsaṃ vikalpajñānaṃ bālamūkāderapyastīti darśayati- bālo 'pi hītyādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:1015: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:1017: satyaṃ nāstiḥ kintu sa evāyam ityenena vikalpasyāvasthocyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1020: etad darśayati- bālasyāpi pūrvaparaparāmarśarūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti,
T11dhnyabpu:1025: evaṃ śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayorapi tadvikalpākāraḥ abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ veditavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:1030: yadayapi hi svalakṣaṇameva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:1032: na cendriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvāt abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavatīti nirvikalpakam /
T11dhnyabpu:1034: śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiñcit vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam- ityabhilākasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:1036: ropitatvāditi saṃsagaṃyogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyarthaṃ yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:1037: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumarilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditam,
T11dhnyabpu:1038: tad dūṣayitumukasṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati ata evetvādi /
T11dhnyabpu:1040: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācya vācakatvamamyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1041: vikalpavijñānasya tu svalakṣaṇavācya vācakatvaṃ pratibhāsino 'pi savikalpakatvamiti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:1045: kutaḥ? sāmānyayorviṣayacintāyāmeva nirasyamānatvāditi nirvikalpakatvakathanaṃ vyartha syādiha /
T11dhnyabpu:1047: tena yad vinītadevena sāmānyayorvācyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyāvijñānasya pratipāditam,
T11dhnyabpu:1054: tadā kiñcid vācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcid vācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇa
T11dhnyabpu:1060: tena etaduktyā śabdārthasāmānyākārarahitāyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:1067: satyapi svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1068: na ca saṃketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpratyamti /
T11dhnyabpu:1073: tayeti / tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sahjñānaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1075: tataḥ śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāccotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvāt savikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam
T11dhnyabpu:1078: tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam,
T11dhnyabpu:1083: tāvat kuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:1084: etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatotyāha na ca saṃketakāletyādi /
T11dhnyabpu:1088: yaśca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānī nāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:1091: yogijñānena yadyekasmin kāle manovijñānena ca yugapaccabdāthau gṛhyate,
T11dhnyabpu:1092: tathāpi sannihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati- yogijñānamityādinā // /5 //
T11dhnyabpu:1097: timiraṃ ca āśubhramaṇaṃ ca nauyānaṃ ca saṃkṣobhaśceti te ādayo yeṣāṃ te timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhādayaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1106: na pratyekam- iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:1114: gaccantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gaccadvṛkṣādibhrāntirutpadyate iti yaunagrahaṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:1119: sarvareva ca vibhramakāraṇairindriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatairindriya- manyate-dharmiṇā kalpanājñānena dharmo 'tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate
T11dhnyabpu:1120: yathā viṣāṇītyava viṣāṇitvamḥ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam /
T11dhnyabpu:1123: na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi sambadhnāti-tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa sambandha ityanena
T11dhnyabpu:1134: bāhyā nauḥ saivāśrayastatra sthitasyāśrayadvārako vibhrama uccate /
T11dhnyabpu:1136: nanu cendriyagatameva vibhramakāraṇam pratyucyateḥ nānyairindriyagatairindriyaṃ bikriyāṃ gatam?
T11dhnyabpu:1148: yathā avatsā gaurānīyatām ityanena kācit aśvā nānīyate ghenurevā noyate tasyā eva vatsambandhadarśanāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1156: pravibhāgo 'yaṃ viprati- meva vikartavyam avikṛte indriye indriyabhrāntyayogāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1157: ete sṃkṣobhaparyantā ādayo yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1163: tairanāhito vibhrabho yasmistat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam // 6 //
T11dhnyabpu:1166: viniścaro tu saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaṃ kṛtvādiśabdena bahubrīhisamāsaṃ darśayataḥ ko 'bhirpāyaṣṭhīkākṛta iti /
T11dhnyabpu:1169: yadā saṃkṣobhaśabdena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsastadāśrayagatasya vibhramakāraṇasya upalakṣaṇatvād vātapittādergrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti nārthabhedaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1173: ucyateḥ, asatyāśubhramaṇādigrahaṇe indriyagatamevādiśabdena kācakāmalādi gṛhyata ityāśaṃkyeta /
T11dhnyabpu:1179: tata ubhayopādāne sati timirādīmybhayakātsnrya labhyata iti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:1180: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānamiti yadayapi sūtre jñānagrahaṇaṃ nāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:1181: tathāpi bhrānte jñānadharmatvād tadvayudāsena jñānameva pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata ityadoṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1182: vinītadevavyākhyāyāṃ bhavati tu pratykṣasūtresyārthakathanaṃ jñānaṃ pratykṣamiti,
T11dhnyabpu:1185: vaibhāṣikaiḥ- cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi iti atiriṣyate/
T11dhnyabpu:1186: mānase ca pratyakṣe doṣa udbhāvita iti /
T11dhnyabpu:1188: rūpaṃ dṛśyate cakṣurvijñānena tadākṛṣṭena manovijñānena iti,
T11dhnyabpu:1203: manastu indriyaṃ naḥ mānasapratyakṣasya pṛthaṅ nirdeśāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1204: tasmāt cakṣurādīndriyeṣu āśritaṃ jñānameva indriyajanya pratyakṣam // 8 //
T11dhnyabpu:1208: teṣāṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtha pratyakṣasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayannāha- taccaturvidhamiti // 7 //
T11dhnyabpu:1214: tanmanojñānaṃ yadīndriyavijñānaviṣaye pravatate tadā gṛhītagrāhitayā pramāṇam athānyaviṣaya pravartate,
T11dhnyabpu:1215: vyavahite pratyakṣaṃ bhavat ki tanmanovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣaṃ syāt?
T11dhnyabpu:1218: nirapekṣatve vānindrisyāpi manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syādityandhavadhirādyabhāvacodayaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:1224: mīmāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ- yogina eva na santi samprati pramāṇābhāvāt,
T11dhnyabpu:1230: indriyāśritaṃ vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam iti bruvatā vārttikakṛtā na cakṣuḥ pramāṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati yasmājjñānasyaivānvayavyatirekānuvidhānād rūpādidarśane sāmarthyam,
T11dhnyabpu:1244: sa sahakāriī yasya indriyajñānasya taqt svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāri indriyajñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:1245: samanantarapratyayabhūtena indriyajñānena janitaṃ yat tadeva manomātrāśrayatvānmānasaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:1248: sva ātmīyo viṣaya indriyajñānasya tasya anantaraḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1251: tataścāntare pratiṣiddhe samānajātīyo dvitīyakṣaṇabhavyupadeyakṣaṇa indriyavijñānaviṣayasya gṛhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1256: iha ca kṣaṇike vastuni atiśayādhānāyogādekakāyakāritvena sahakārī gṛhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1261: tasyanantara ityasya vivaraṇam- na vidayata ityādi /
T11dhnyabpu:1280: smantara iti ca bhavati śakan'vādiṣu pāṭhāt ṣararūpatvam,
T11dhnyabpu:1281: yataḥ sa ceti iha svaviṣayānantaraviṣaya it kathanaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇādavabodhakaṃ na bhavatīti doṣam,
T11dhnyabpu:1291: tadanenaikasantānāntarbhūtayoreva indriyajñāna manovijñānayojanyajanakabhāve manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti uktaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:1298: tena janitamityādinetat kathayati- indriyavijñānena svaviṣayāntaraviṣayasahakāriṇopādānabhūtena yajjanitaṃ tadeva manovijñānaṃ pratyakṣam /
T11dhnyabpu:1300: yadā cetyādinā dvayorekaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhītvā yaccoditaṃ pareṇa tat parihṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:1301: pūrvakṣaṇe indriyavijñānasya viṣayo dvitīyakṣaṇe manovijñānasya viṣaya ityagṛhītagrāhi manovijñānam /
T11dhnyabpu:1302: yadā cityādinā yaccodayaṃ kṛtam- yadi manovijñānamindriyasavyapekṣam,
T11dhnyabpu:1310: tena teṣāṃ na manovijñānaṃ bhavatīti parihṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:1315: anyathā pañca bāhyā vijñeyāḥ ityasya vyaghātaḥ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1317: nopādeyakṣaṇa evaḥ tena vijñānaviṣayadeśe 'paraśbdo yadotpadyate tadā mānasaṃ pratykṣaṃ svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā janitaṃ bhavatītyadoṣaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:1319: kutaḥ? indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:1322: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya /
T11dhnyabpu:1325: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti // 9 //
T11dhnyabpu:1328: yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣaye notpadayateḥ indriyāṇāṃ tatra vyāpārābhāvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1329: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:1330: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti?
T11dhnyabpu:1333: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam /
T11dhnyabpu:1338: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:1342: evaṃ manyate- vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate,
T11dhnyabpu:1345: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:1346: tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti?
T11dhnyabpu:1350: tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti,
T11dhnyabpu:1365: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:1369: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1374: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:1383: tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1394: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa,
T11dhnyabpu:1395: prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam,
T11dhnyabpu:1399: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇam?
T11dhnyabpu:1402: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti /
T11dhnyabpu:1403: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:1409: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
T11dhnyabpu:1410: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate /
T11dhnyabpu:1411: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1412: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta,
T11dhnyabpu:1414: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam /
T11dhnyabpu:1416: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam /
T11dhnyabpu:1419: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1420: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1426: evaṃ manyate- yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate,
T11dhnyabpu:1427: tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na jñānāntaramapekṣate /
T11dhnyabpu:1431: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva /
T11dhnyabpu:1434: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:1435: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam /
T11dhnyabpu:1436: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate,
T11dhnyabpu:1439: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante /
T11dhnyabpu:1445: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1461: evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca śakyate vktumiti /
T11dhnyabpu:1462: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:1468: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam /
T11dhnyabpu:1469: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti /
T11dhnyabpu:1481: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1491: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:1492: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā,
T11dhnyabpu:1494: tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1495: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
T11dhnyabpu:1497: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā /
T11dhnyabpu:1498: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
T11dhnyabpu:1501: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati- bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā,
T11dhnyabpu:1506: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt tadgrāhi vijñānaṃ nirvikalpakamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:1507: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
T11dhnyabpu:1508: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:1511: eva manyate- aydyapi manovijñānaṃ vācya vācakasaṃsṛṣṭipratibhāsi,
T11dhnyabpu:1521: tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate /
T11dhnyabpu:1523: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād,
T11dhnyabpu:1527: aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1528: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:1529: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
T11dhnyabpu:1532: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante
T11dhnyabpu:1534: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1536: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat,
T11dhnyabpu:1554: viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvi no 'bhāva ityasannihitaṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tad vastvāropya gṛhṇad vikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ bhavatīti /
T11dhnyabpu:1555: sphuṭatvaṃ tato nivṛttaṃ nirvikalpe 'vattiṣṭhate iti vyāptiḥ sidhyati /
T11dhnyabpu:1556: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvāt saṃvādakam /
T11dhnyabpu:1561: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
T11dhnyabpu:1564: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi /
T11dhnyabpu:1565: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:1567: vastuno hyasādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvamasti sāmānyaṃ ca /
T11dhnyabpu:1569: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya- grāhyaśca yadākāramutpadyate,
T11dhnyabpu:1583: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakābidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣo dvāvapi viṣayakalpitau /
T11dhnyabpu:1585: sāṅkhayena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1587: ātmārdvatatayā sarvasyaikatvāda viśeṣe bhrāntatvāda dvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye /
T11dhnyabpu:1594: etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:1595: sādhāraṇaṃ tu tattvamāropitaṃ rūpam pūrvāparakṣaṇā nāmabhedāvyavasāyāt /
T11dhnyabpu:1598: tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:1603: yaṃ santānarūpeṇa sthitamartha tat pṛṣṭha bhāvina vikalpena vinścinoti /
T11dhnyabpu:1604: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya santāno viṣayaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:1607: pratyakṣavyāpāreṇa vikalpenādhyavaseyatayā viṣayīkṛtatvāt pratyakṣaviṣaya ityucyate upacārādityadoṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1618: asannidhāne sa punarāropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇetvenāvasīyate yataḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:1621: tadatra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ // 12 //
T11dhnyabpu:1622: kaḥ punarasau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavyaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:1628: tasmāt sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyakārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
T11dhnyabpu:1636: evaṃ manyate- nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadap svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:1637: asannidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadeva sya vyākhyā dūṣitā /
T11dhnyabpu:1638: tena hyevaivyākhyātam- sarveṇa rūpeṇa vastuno 'bhāvo 'sannidhānam iti /
T11dhnyabpu:1639: etadasaṅgatam yasmād vastunastatrābhāve jñānameva ha bhavati /
