T11dhnyabpu:2357: tadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:2367: 14 yaḥ svabhāva satsvapyanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāva viśeṣaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:2380: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san cakṣurādisannidhāne viprakarṣaprakāratrayeṇa aviprakṛṣṭaḥ śakyadarśanaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2382: tena cakṣurādisannidhāne 'pi pratyakṣayogyaghaṭānupalabdheḥ atra ghaṭo nāsti ityayamartha ukta iti // 14 //
T11dhnyabpu:2390: svabhāva eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmādīt viśeṣo viśiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2391: tadayaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntarasākalpaṃ ca- etad dvayamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ ghaṭāderdraṣṭavyam // 13 //
T11dhnyabpu:2395: upalambhasya yāni ghaṭād dṛśyāt pratyayāntarāṇi teṣu satsu vidyamāneṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2397: tathā ca sati draṣṭuṃ pravṛttasyaikasya draṣṭurddaśayamāna ubhayavān bhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2399: yairhi pratyayaiḥ sa draṣṭā paśyati te sannihitāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2400: ataśca sannihitā yad draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ saḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2401: draṣṭumapravṛttasya tu yogyadeśasthā api draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ pratyayāntaravaikalpavantaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣayuktāstu /
T11dhnyabpu:2415: sattāmātre bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa sattāmātrabhāvī,
T11dhnyabpu:2422: atha kasmāt ligaṃ trividham iti vyavasthitiḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:2436: na tu hetusatāyā vyatiriktaṃ kañcid hetumapekṣate sa svasattāmātrabhāvī sādhyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2437: tasmin sādhye yo hetuḥ sa svabhāvastasya sādhyasya, nānyaḥ // 15 //
T11dhnyabpu:2444: tatra pracuraśiśape deśe 'viditaśiśapāvyavahāro jaḍo yadā kenaciduccāṃ śiṃśapāmupādarśyocyate- ayaṃ vṛkṣa iti,
T11dhnyabpu:2445: tadā asau jāḍayācciśapāyā uccatvamapi vṛkṣavyavahārasya nimittamavasyati /
T11dhnyabpu:2446: sa mūḍhaḥ śiśapātvamātra nimitte vṛkṣavyavahāre pravartyate,
T11dhnyabpu:2454: kāryakāraṇabhāvo loke pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanaḥ pratīta iti na svabhāvasyeva kāryasya lakṣaṇamuktam // 17 //
T11dhnyabpu:2461: anumeyasya bhāvarūpasya dvaividhyena bhāvasādhano 'pi dvividho bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:2462: tathā hi- 1 sādhyahetvoḥ svarūpabhede abhinnaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayituṃ na śaknoti /
T11dhnyabpu:2463: 2 sādhyahetvoḥ svarūpābhede ca bhinnaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayituṃ na śaknoti /
T11dhnyabpu:2471: atha kasmād dvāveva vastusādhano iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:2474: tatsattve eva liṅgalakṣaṇārthena sādhyalakṣaṇārthasya pratyāyanamiti śeṣaḥ // 19 //
T11dhnyabpu:2475: kasmāt svabhāvapratibandhasattva eva artho 'rtha gamayoditi cet?
T11dhnyabpu:2477: atreti / eṣu triṣu hetuṣu madhyedvau hetū vastusādhanau vidheḥ sādhanau gamakau /
T11dhnyabpu:2500: kāraṇe svabhāve ca sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ kāryasvabhāvayoraviśiṣṭa ityekena samāsena dvayorapi saṃgrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2502: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyaṃ gamayet,
T11dhnyabpu:2505: kasmāt punaḥ svabhāvapratibandha eva sati gamyagamakabhāvaḥ, nānyathā?
T11dhnyabpu:2519: yo yatra svabhavena pratibaddhaḥ tasya tadapratibaddhasya /
T11dhnyabpu:2524: tadayamarthaḥ- na hi yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2525: sa tamapratibandhaviṣaya mavaśyameva na vyabhicāratīti nāsti tayoravyabhicāraniyamaḥ= avinābhāvaniyamaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2527: na hi yogyatayā pradīpavat parokṣārthapratipattinimittamiṣṭaṃ liṅgam,
T11dhnyabpu:2540: tatrāyamarthaḥ- tādātmyaviśeṣe 'pi yat pratibaddhaṃ tad gamakam /
T11dhnyabpu:2542: yasya ca dharmasya yo niyata svabhāvaḥ sa tatprativaddhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2544: yasya tu sa cānyaśca svabhāvaḥ sa pratibandhaviṣayaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2557: atha kathamucyate- sādhyārthatādātmyāt sādhyārthādutpatteścaiva liṅgasya pratibandha iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:2560: yadapi ca notpadayate sādhyārthāt tasya tena pratibandha /
T11dhnyabpu:2561: kena prakāreṇābhidhīyeta apratibaddhaṃ ca na liṅgam,
T11dhnyabpu:2566: tataśca kimāyātamiti cet? āha- te ceti /
T11dhnyabpu:2569: sa sādhyo 'rtha ātmā svabhāvo yasya tat tadātmā,
T11dhnyabpu:2584: api tu tataḥ tadutpattaśca sādhye 'rthe svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya // 22 //
T11dhnyabpu:2591: yo yatsvabhāvo yadutpattiśca na bhavati tasya atatsvabhāvasya atadupatteśca /
T11dhnyabpu:2592: atra atatsvabhāve anutpādake cāpratibaddhaḥ sbabhāvo 'syeti so 'yamapratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2602: 24 te ca tādātmyatadutpattau svabhāvakāryayoreveti tābhyāmeva vastusiddhiḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:2618: tathā hi- vastuni vidayamāne sā na sambhavati // 26 //
T11dhnyabpu:2625: yasmāt svabhāve kārye eva ca tādātmyatadutpattī sthite,
T11dhnyabpu:2627: tasmāt tābhyāmeva kāryasvabhāvābhyāṃ vastuno vidheḥ siddhiḥ // 24 //
T11dhnyabpu:2630: pratiṣedhavyavahārasya siddhiryathoktā yā dṛśyānupalabdhistata eva bhavati yatastasmādanyato noktā // 25 //
T11dhnyabpu:2634: yasmād dṛśyānupalabdhirna sambhavati tasmād asambhavāt tataḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ // 26 //
T11dhnyabpu:2637: sati vastuni tasyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavād- tyanyathāśabdasyārthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2639: kuta etat- satyapi vastuni tasyāḥ sambhavaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:2642: 27 anyathā cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu deśa kāla svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣvartheṣu ātmapratyakṣanivṛtterabhāvaniścayābhāvāt //
T11dhnyabpu:2645: tadā deśa kālasvabhāvairviprakṛṣṭā vyavahitā ye 'rthā nopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ teṣu ca yā pratipattupratyakṣanivṛttiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2655: tasmāt yathoktā anupalabdhireva pratiṣedhasādhikā iti sthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:2656: evaṃ kvacit kālaviśeṣe 'grahe 'pi yathoktā anupalabdhireva pratiṣeśasādhikā bhavatītyucyate // 27 //
T11dhnyabpu:2664: deśaśca kālaśca svabhāvaśca tairviprakṛṣṭā iti bigrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2667: ityāha- teṣu pratipattu rātmano yat pratyakṣaṃ tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇāt niścayābhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2669: tasmāt satyapi vastuni ātmapratyakṣanivṛttilakṣaṇāyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2680: avidhyamāno 'pi ca ghaṭādirekajñānasaṃsargiṇi saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādau sa tathokaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2682: atītavartamānakālayoryaḥ śūnyapradeśādirupalabdhaḥ tatpradeśādisamānayogyo yo ghaṭādiḥ sa evātītavartamānatvenocyate /
T11dhnyabpu:2683: anyathā pradeśādau ghaṭādyabhāve cātītatvaṃ vartamānatvaṃ ca kutaḥ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:2688: evamuktaprakāreṇa pratipattu pratyakṣasyātītasya vartamānasya ca nivṛttirabhāvāśritatvādaparavastulakṣaṇā /
T11dhnyabpu:2690: abhāvavyavahārastu iha ghaṭo nāsti ityevamākāraṃ vijñānam,
T11dhnyabpu:2693: jñānābhidhānapravṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ bhūtale bhāsamāne samagrasāmagrīko jñāyamāno dṛśyatayā sambhāvitatvāt pratyakṣa uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2695: tato hi dṛśyamānādarthāt tadbuddheśca samagradarśanasāmagrīkatvena pratyakṣatayā sambhāvitasya nivṛttiravasīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:2701: 3 satyamevaitat kevalamekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhavediti dṛśay sambhāvitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2709: tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣa nivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛttirityuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:2712: vartamāne ca ghaṭasya tattadrūpamāropitamasata iti draṣṭavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:2720: tathā hi bhāvikālasya pradeśādidharmī na pratyakṣa /
T11dhnyabpu:2722: atītakālasya tu dharmī pratyakṣaḥ ghaṭaśūnyapradeśaśca smaryate /
T11dhnyabpu:2730: amūḍho 'bhraṣṭo darśanāhitaḥ smṛtijananarūpaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādau sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2734: yasmādatīte ghaṭaviviktapradeśadarśane smṛtisaṃskāro mūḍho dṛśyaghaṭānupalambhe dṛśye ca ghaṭe 'mūḍho bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:2735: vartamāne tu ghaṭarahitapradeśadarśane na smṛti saṃskāramohaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2736: ata eva na ghaṭābhāve nāpi ghaṭānupalambhe ghaṭe mohaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2740: ca śabdaḥ kṛto viśeṣaṇarahitasya vartamānasya viśeṣaṇavatātītena samuccayo yathā vijñāyeteti /
T11dhnyabpu:2741: tadayamarthaḥ- atīto 'nupalambhaḥ sphuṭaṃ smaryamāṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ vartamānaśca /
T11dhnyabpu:2743: na tu n abhaviṣyatyatra ghaṭo 'nupalapsyamānatvādi śakyaṃ jñātum /
T11dhnyabpu:2745: vyāpāraṃ darśayati- abhāvasya vyavahāraḥ nāsti ityevamākārakaṃ jñānam,
T11dhnyabpu:2748: ghaṭābhāve hi jñāte niḥśaṅka gantumāgantuṃ ca pravartate /
T11dhnyabpu:2749: tadetasya trividhasyāpi abhāvavyavahārasya dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ pravartanī sādhanī pravartikā /
T11dhnyabpu:2750: yadyapi ca nāsti ghaṭaḥ iti jñānamanupalabdhereva bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:2752: tathāpi yasmāt pratyakṣeṇa kevalaḥ pradeśa upalabdhastasmāt iha ghaṭo nāsti ityeva ca pratyakṣavyāpāramanusaratyabhāvaniścayaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2756: pratipatta pratyakṣa ityuktvā ca nikhilapratipatta pratyakṣaṃ nirastam /
T11dhnyabpu:2759: anantaroktā anupalabdhirevābhāvavyavahārasādhanī ityetadeva kasmāt iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:2767: kiñca- dṛśyānupalambhaniścayakaraṇasāmarthyādeva pūrvoktayā nītyā pratyakṣaṇaivābhāvo niścitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2773: na tvakṛtaṃ karoti- ityabhāvaniścayo 'nupalambhāt pravṛtto 'pi pratyakṣeṇa kṛto 'nupalambhena pravartita ukta ityabhāvavyavahārapravartanyanupalabdhiḥ
T11dhnyabpu:2781: sā ca eṣānupalabdhiḥ ekādaśaprakārā ekādaśa prakārā asya ityekādaśaprakārā /
T11dhnyabpu:2806: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā nātra apratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni santīti /
T11dhnyabpu:2817: apratibaddham= anupahataṃ dhūmajananaṃ prati sāmarthya yeṣāṃ tānyapratibaddhasāmarthyāni /
T11dhnyabpu:2820: kāraṇāni ca nāvarśyaṃ kāryavanti bhavantīti kāryādarśanādapratibaddhasāmarthyānāmevābhāvaḥ sādhyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2826: tatra dhavalagṛhoparisthito gṛhāṅgaṇamapaśyannapi caturṣu pārśvaṣvaṅgaṇabhittiparyantaṃ paśyati /
T11dhnyabpu:2831: tadgṛhāṅgaṇadeśena ca vahninā janyamāno dhūmastaddeśaḥ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:2833: tad gṛhāṅgaṇadeśa bhittiparikṣiptaṃ bhittiparyantaparikṣiptena cālokātmanā dhūmaviviktenākāśadeśena saha dharmiṇaṃ karoti /
T11dhnyabpu:2842: apratibaddhasāmarthyāni dhūmakāraṇāni na santītyanena sādhyadharma uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2868: śabdasya kṣaṇikatve sādhye kaścideva śabdaḥ pratyakṣaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2871: yathā cātra dharmī sādhyapratipattyadhikaraṇabhūto dṛśyādṛśyāvayavo darśitaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2873: pratiṣedhyasya vyāpyasya yo vyāpako dharmaratasyānupalabdhirudāhriyate- vyāpavetyādi /
T11dhnyabpu:2881: tatra yadā pūrvāparāvupalipṭau samunnatau deśau bhavataḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:2884: draṣṭāpi tatsthān vṛkṣān paśyannapi śiśapādibhedaṃ yo na vivecayati,
T11dhnyabpu:2887: sa hi nirvṛkṣa ekaśilāghaṭite vṛkṣābhāvaṃ dṛśyatvād dṛśyānualambhādavasyati /
T11dhnyabpu:2895: 36 viruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā- na dhruvabhāvo bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśo hetvantarāpakṣaṇāditi //
T11dhnyabpu:2898: tathā hi- agneḥ śītasparśena virodhāt tatsattve śītasparśo nivāryate // 34 //
T11dhnyabpu:2914: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā na dhruvabhāvo bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśa iti /
T11dhnyabpu:2933: tatra samastapavarakasthaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasyāgneranumāpakaṃ yadā viśiṣṭaṃ dhūmakalāpaṃ niryāntamapavarakāt paśyati,
T11dhnyabpu:2935: iha dṛśyamānadvārapradeśasahitaḥ sarvo 'pavarakābhyantaradeśo dharmī sādhyapratipattyanusaraṇātpūrvavad draṣṭavya iti // 35 //
T11dhnyabpu:2936: pratiṣedhasya yad viruddhaṃ tena vyāptasya dharmāntarasya upalabdhirudāhartavyā /
T11dhnyabpu:2947: śeṣa / bhūtasyāpi bhāvsya vināśaḥ ityanena dharmī uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2949: tena jātasyaiva bhāvasya vināśo na nitya ityamarthaḥ paryavasitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2973: tathā ca sati parasparaparihāravatordvayoryadaikaṃ dṛśyate tatra dvitīyasya tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kāryaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2975: yata evaṃ tādātmyaniṣedhaḥ kriyate- yadayayaṃ dṛśyamāno nityo bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:2979: evaṃ ca pratiṣedhasya nityatvasya dṛśyamānātmakatvamabhyupagamya pratiṣedahḥ kṛto bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:2982: yadayayaṃ ghaṭo dṛśyamānaḥ piśācātmā bhavet piśāco dṛṣṭo bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:2985: dṛśyātmatvābhyupagamapūrvako dṛśyamāne ghaṭādau vastuni vastuno 'vastuno vā dṛśyasyādṛśyasya ca tādātmyapratiṣedhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:2986: tathā ca sati yathā ghaṭasya dṛśyatvamabhyupagamya pratiṣedho dṛśyānupalambhādeva,
T11dhnyabpu:2987: tadvat saravsya parasparaparihāravato 'nyatra dṛśyamāne niṣedho dṛśyānupalambhadeva /
T11dhnyabpu:2989: pratiṣedhyasya yat kārya tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasyopalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti /
T11dhnyabpu:3000: yatra śītasparśastatrāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni ca kathamapi na /
T11dhnyabpu:3017: yatrā ca śītasparśastatra tuṣārasparśo 'pi kathamapi na // 38 //
T11dhnyabpu:3027: dṛśyatve tu śītasparśasya tatkāraṇānāṃ vā kāryānupalabdhiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3030: tato yasminnuddeśe sadapi śītakāraṇamadṛśyaṃ śītasparśaśca dūrasthatvāt,
T11dhnyabpu:3031: pratipattu rvahnirbhāsvaravarṇatvād dūrādapi dṛśya tatrāyaṃ prayoga iti // 37 //
T11dhnyabpu:3032: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tena yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdhirudāhatavyā yatheti /
T11dhnyabpu:3036: yatra vyāpyastaṣārasparśo vyāpakaśca śītasparśo na dṛśyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3046: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasyānupalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti / atreti
T11dhnyabpu:3067: te ca romaharṣādaya eva viśeṣā iti romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3070: iha ca śītavāyupīḍitasya ye romaharṣāste eva bodhyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3085: niṣkampāyatasalilapūrite hnade hemantocitabāṣpodgame virale sandhyātamasi sati sannapi attra dhūmo na dṛśyata iti kāraṇānupalabdhyā pratiṣedhyate
T11dhnyabpu:3086: vahnistu yadi tasyāmbhasaḥ upari ṣlavamāno bhavet prajvalitaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3090: ādhārarūpeṇa vā dṛśya eva vahniriti tatrāsya prayoga iti // 39 //
T11dhnyabpu:3091: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasyopalabdherudāharaṇam- yatheti /
T11dhnyabpu:3094: sa ādiryeṣāṃ dantavīṇādīnāṃ śītakṛtānām te viśiṣyante tadanyebhyo bhayaśraddhādikṛtebhya iti romaharṣādiviśaṣāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3096: dahana eva viśiṣyate tadanyasmād dahanāccītanivartanasāmarthyaneti dahanaviśaṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3100: sannihito dahanaviśeṣo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvastasmāditi hetuḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3102: 41 kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā- na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavā yaṃ pradeśaḥ dhūmāditi //
T11dhnyabpu:3104: tathāhi- atra romaharṣādi viśeṣasya hetuḥ śītasparśaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3113: dṛṣṭāntamāha- yathā na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
T11dhnyabpu:3119: sa vidayate yasmin pradeśe sa roma harṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavān /
T11dhnyabpu:3129: teṣāṃ kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhyābhāvaṃ pratipadyata iti tatrāsya prayoga iti // /40 //
T11dhnyabpu:3130: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yad viruddhaṃ tasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirudāhartavyā- yatheti /
T11dhnyabpu:3145: dhūmastu yaduśastaddeśe sthitaṃ śītaṃ nivartayituṃ samarthasya vahnaranumāpakaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3146: dhūmamātreṇa tu vahnimātre 'numite 'pi na śītasparśanivṛtiḥ, nāpi roma
T11dhnyabpu:3147: 42 ime sarve kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdho saṃgrahanupayāntīti //
T11dhnyabpu:3151: yatra na śītasparśastatra śītakāryāṇi romaharṣādiviśeṣāḥ kathaṃ syuḥ // 41 //
T11dhnyabpu:3153: atha kathaṃ kāryānupalabdhyādibhiḥ svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādibhiśca pratiṣedha iti cet? tatrāha-
T11dhnyabpu:3163: harṣādiviśeṣanivṛttiravasātuṃ śakyeti na dhūmamātraṃ heturiti draṣṭavyamiti // 41 //
T11dhnyabpu:3171: kāryānupalabdhyadīnāmai trayāṇāṃ caturṇā vā garahaṇe prasaktaḥ? āha- daśeti /
T11dhnyabpu:3172: tatra daśānāmapyudāharaṇamātrāṇāṃ grahaṇaprasaṅga satyāha- sarva iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3194: tathāhi kvacit kāryānupalbdhī dhūmābhāvena dhūmahetorapratibaddhasāmarthyasya abhāve siddhe abhāvapratītirbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3195: yatra yatra dhūmābhāvastatra tatropalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptasyaiva taddhetoranupalabdhiriti svabhāvānupalabdhāvantarbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3196: pratipattu ṇāṃ cintābhedād bhedaḥ- kasyacit kāryābhāvadvāreṇa hetvabhāvapratītiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3207: paramārthatastu na pratijñaikadeśasyāpi hetutve sati paramparārtho 'pi na ramyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3208: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādiṣu ca vijātīyapramāṇena nivṛtyābhidhānamiti kiṃ kena samānaṃ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:3210: tatrānupalabdhiprayogaprakāraviśeṣā ekādaśa iti kuta iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:3217: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na sākṣādete prayogā dṛśyānupalabdhimabhidadhati,
T11dhnyabpu:3233: 45 sarvatra cāsyāmabhavavyavahrasādhanyāmanupalabdhau yeṣāṃ svabhāvaviruddhādīnāmupalabdhyā kāraṇādīnāmanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3237: tasmāt prayogeṣvabhyāsātiśayāt svayamapi yadā kasyacit vyavaccedapratītirbhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:3249: prayogābhyāsātḥ tasmāt svapratipattāvapyupayujyamānasyāsya prayogabhedasya svārthānumāne nirdeśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3253: dṛśyaniṣedhe svabhāvānupalabdhiprayogaprasaṅgāt tathā ca sati na teṣāṃ dṛśyānupalabdheniṣedhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3262: yasmāt sarvatrānupalabdhau yeṣāṃ pratiṣedha uktasteṣāmupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānāṃ dṛśyānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3270: yadi nāma svabhāvaviruddhādyupalabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedha uktaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3274: yasmād ye virodhinaḥ vyāpya- vyāpakabhūtāḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtāśca jñātāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3293: tasmāt svabhāpraviruddhādyu palabdhyā kāraṇādyanupalabdhyā copalabdhyanupalabdhimatāṃ viruddhādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyānāmeva kṛto draṣṭavyaḥ
T11dhnyabpu:3294: bahuṣu codyeṣu prakrānteṣu parihārasamuccayārthaścakāro hetvartho bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3299: upalabdhyanupalabdhimadbhayo 'nye 'nupalabdhā eva ye teṣāṃ virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca kenacit saha abhāvaśca vyāpyasya vyāpakasyābhāve na
T11dhnyabpu:3300: yasmāt tato virodhakāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāsiddhe kāraṇād upalabdhyanupalabdhimanta eva viruddhādayo niṣedhyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3303: tadayamarthaḥ- virodhaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca vyāpakābhāve vyāpyābhāvaśca dṛśyānupalabdhereveti /
T11dhnyabpu:3306: vyāpakābhimatābhāve ca vyāpyābhimatābhāve niścite niścito vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3308: iha gṛhīte vṛkṣābhāve hi śiśapātvābhāvapratītau pratīto vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3312: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ ca smaratā virodha kāryakāarṇabhāva vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaviṣayābhāvapratipattinibandhanaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ smartavyā /
T11dhnyabpu:3315: tathāhi- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya niyatānuṣaṅgīṇo ye dṛṣṭāstatsannidhāne kasyacit tirobhāve tena saha virodhasya pratyāyanaṃ śakyam /
T11dhnyabpu:3326: viprakṛṣṭī yo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttisvabhāvaḥ sa saṃśayasya hetuḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3334: tataḥ samprati nāsti dṛśyānupalabdhiprayogād bhidyante kāryānupalabdhyādiprayogāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3338: tadanena sarveṇa dṛśyānupalabdhāvantarbhāvo daśānāmamanupalabdhiprayogāṇāṃ pāramparyeṇa darśita ityavaseyam // 46 //
T11dhnyabpu:3346: ityāha- pratyakṣānumānanivṛttirlakṣāṇaṃ svabhāvo yasyāḥ sā pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣāṇā /
T11dhnyabpu:3353: pramāṇaṃ tu arthakāryamiti pramāṇanivṛttyā kāraṇamātranivṛttinaṃ sidhyatīti // 48 //
T11dhnyabpu:3358: kāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca nivartamānaṃ kārya vyāpyaṃ ca nivartayet /
T11dhnyabpu:3364: yat punah pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati, tadyuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:3370: ācāryadharmottarakṛtāyāṃ vyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ svārthānumānaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3379: trīṇi rūpāṇi santi yasya tat trirūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:3387: trīṇi rūpāṇi- anvaya vyatireka pakṣadharmatvasaṃjñakāni yasya tat trirūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:3399: tasmin kāraṇe vacane kāryasyānumānasya upacāraḥ samāropaḥ kriyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3403: na yāvat kiñcit upacārādanumānaśabdena vaktuṃ śakyaṃ tāvat sarva vyākhyeyam,
T11dhnyabpu:3406: tacca svayaṃ vā pratītamanumānasya nimittaṃ bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:3435: tataḥ pratipādakaṃ śabdamavaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ darśayan anumānaśabdenoktavānācārya iti paramārthaḥ // 2 //
T11dhnyabpu:3436: parārthānumānasya prakārabhedaṃ darśayitukāma āha- tad dvividhamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:3438: dvau vidhau= prakārau yasya tad dvividham // 3 //
T11dhnyabpu:3449: dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā saha sādhyadharmiṇaḥ sādṛśyaṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādharmyamucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3451: tatra yasya sādhanavākyasya sādharmyamabhidheyaṃ tat sādharmyavat /
T11dhnyabpu:3454: tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ ityatra kṛtakatvakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭānta sādhyadharmiṇoḥ sāduśyabhidheyam /
T11dhnyabpu:3458: śabdastu kṛtakaḥ iti kṛtakatvākṛtakatvakṛtaṃ śabdākāśayoḥ sādhya dṛṣṭāntadharmoṇorasādṛśyamihābhidheyam // 5 //
T11dhnyabpu:3461: 8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'dvayava hāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3463: nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśaṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭaḥ- ityanupalabdhiprayogaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3467: tat kasmāt prayogabhedena dvividhamityucyate iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:3475: tathā hi- prathame vastuto 'nvayābhidhāne 'pi vyatirekaḥ sāmarthyādavagamyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3476: dvitīye ca vastuto vyatirekā bhidhāne 'pi anvayo 'rthājjñāyate // 7 //
T11dhnyabpu:3482: yat prayojanaṃ prakāśayitavyaṃ vastu uddiśyānumāne prayujyate,
T11dhnyabpu:3488: tathā ca na tato bhedaḥ kaścit // 6 //
T11dhnyabpu:3497: anvaye hi kathite vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vyatirekagatirbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3502: yasmāt pīno devadatto divā na bhuṃkte pīno devadatto rātrau bhuṃkte ityanayovakyiyorabhidheyabhede 'pi gamyamānamekameva,
T11dhnyabpu:3504: 9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam,
T11dhnyabpu:3512: tena dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ nopalabhyate iti anena pakṣadharma uktaḥ // 8 //
T11dhnyabpu:3514: dvitīyasya hetoḥ sādharmyavān prayoga upadarśyate yat tatreti /
T11dhnyabpu:3524: yathoktam- vyāptirvyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva vyāpyasya vā tatraiva bhāvaḥ iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3534: tata eva pramāṇādanena vākye nābhidhīyamānā vyāptirjñātavyā /
T11dhnyabpu:3535: samprati vyāpti kathayitvā dṛśyānupalambhasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ darśayitumāha nopalabhyate ceti /
T11dhnyabpu:3542: sa evābhāvavyavahārādhikaraṇaṃ yaḥ pratipattaḥ pratyakṣaḥ, nānyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3545: yathā cāsato 'pi ghaṭasya samāropitamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ tathā vyākhyātam // 8 //
T11dhnyabpu:3549: yat saditi sattvamanūdya tat sarvamanityamityanityanityatvaṃ vidhīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3562: ātmabhūtadharmasyaiva bhedaṃ kṛtvā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3573: anityatvādanyatra nityatve sattvaṃ nāstītyevaṃ sattvamanityatve sādhye niyataṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3589: tathā ca vyatiriktamevotpattyā viśiṣṭa vastu utpattimaduktam /
T11dhnyabpu:3590: tena svabhāvabhūtena dharmeṇa kalpitabhedena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukto viditavyaḥ // 10 //
T11dhnyabpu:3592: kṛtakatvamanūdyānityatvaṃ vidhīyate- iti anityatve niyataṃ kṛtakatvamuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:3596: tasya bhedena bhinnenopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ prayukta ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3597: 12 apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3600: tatrāha- apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpatau kṛtaka iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3602: yaśca bhāvaḥ svabhāniṣpattaye hetūnāṃ vyāpāramapekṣate iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3605: evamiti / ete 'pi upādhibhedāpekṣitāḥ svabhāvahetva eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3606: tathā hi prayatne= hetuvyāpāre sati yasya siddhiḥ sa prayatnāntarīyaka iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3607: tena anityaṃ prayatnāntaroyakatvāda ityayanapi anabhivyaktaviśeṣaṇaḥ svabhāvahetureva /
T11dhnyabpu:3609: pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ śīla yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī,
T11dhnyabpu:3612: tathā hi- svalpakardamapiṇḍād ghaṭaḥ kṣudro bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:3623: nanu ca citraguśabde vyatiriktasya viśeṣaṇasya vācakaścitraśabdo gośabdaśvāsti,
T11dhnyabpu:3626: pareṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ vyāpāraḥ svabhāvasya niṣpattau niṣpatyarthamapekṣitaḥ paravyāpāro yena sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3629: tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāva ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3643: 14 sannutpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmopadarśanam //
T11dhnyabpu:3644: 15 sarve ete sādhanadharmāḥ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddha sādhana dharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3651: kṛtakaḥ śabda iti prayogabhedadarśanāthaṃ vā iti // 14 //
T11dhnyabpu:3652: tanmātrānubandhini sādhyadharme svabhāvo hetuḥ iti pūrva svabhāvahetulakṣaṇaṃ yadabhihitam,
T11dhnyabpu:3654: pūrva yeṣāṃ trividhānāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ pakṣadharmā uktāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3657: prayatnānantarīyakatvādīnāṃ te 'pi svabhāvahetoḥ prayogāḥ bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvābhidhāyino draṣṭavyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3660: tena pratyayabhedena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedo śabdaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3669: evamartha caitadākhyātam- vācakabhedānmā bhūt kasyacit svabhāvahetāvapi prayukte vyāmoha iti // 13 //
T11dhnyabpu:3670: atha kimete svabhāvahetavaḥ siddhasambandhe svabhāve sādhye prayoktavyāḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3686: siddhaḥ sādhanadharmāmātrānubandho yasya sādhya dharmasya tasmin /
T11dhnyabpu:3687: yathāsvaṃ sādhyadharme sādhanadharmamātrānubandhe sādhite eva te pakṣadharmā hetutvenābhidheyā iti // 15 //
T11dhnyabpu:3696: yasya sādhyadharmasya yadātmīyaṃ pramāṇaṃ tenaiva pramāṇena siddha ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3697: svabhāvahetūnāṃ ca bahubhedadatvāt sambandhasādhanānyapi pramāṇāni bahūnīti pramāṇairiti bahuvacana nirdeśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3700: tadayaṃ paramārthaḥ- na hetuḥ pradīpavat yogyatayā gamakaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3704: prathamaṃ bādhakena pramāṇena sādhyapratibandho niścetavyo hetoḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3706: kṛtakatvaṃ nāmānityasvabhāvamiti sāmānyena smṛtamarya punarviśeṣe yojayati- idamapi kṛtakatvaṃ śabde vartamānamanityasvabhāvameveti /
T11dhnyabpu:3710: tena niścitatanmātrānubandhe sādhyadharme svabhāva hetavaḥ prayoktavyāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3712: yadyevaṃ sambandho niścetavyaḥ sāśyasya sādhanena saha,
T11dhnyabpu:3718: yo hi sādhyadharmaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhavān sa eva tasya sādhanadharmasya svabhāvaḥ, nānyaḥ // 16 //
T11dhnyabpu:3724: kathaṃ sādhyānanubandhī syāt tathā hi tanmātrānubandho svabhāva eveti // 17 //
T11dhnyabpu:3727: yadi sādhanadharmasya kṛtakatvādeḥ siddhau sādhyo 'nityatvādinaṃ siddhayati,
T11dhnyabpu:3728: tadā kṛtakatvānityatve paramārthata ekasvabhāve na syātām // 19 //
T11dhnyabpu:3730: svabhāva eva tu sādhye kasmād hetuprayogaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3733: tasmāt sa eva sādhyaḥ kartavyoḥ yaḥ sādhanasya svabhāvaḥ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:3741: niścayārūḍhaṃ ca rūpaṃ samāropitena bhedenetaretaravyāvṛttikena bhinnamiti anyat sādhanam,
T11dhnyabpu:3743: dūrāddhi śākhādimānartho vṛkṣaḥ iti niścīyate na śiśapeti /
T11dhnyabpu:3751: kasmāt punaḥ sādhanadharmamātrānubandhyeva sādhyaḥ svabhāvaḥ, nānyaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:3768: 22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3772: tadavaśyamevānutpannasya kasyāpi vināśasyāpi na sambhava iti // 20 //
T11dhnyabpu:3776: yatreti asmin pardeśe dhūmastatra sarvatrāgnirityanvaya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3780: abhimatadeśe ca dhūmo dṛśyata iti pakṣadharmo darśitaḥ // 21 //
T11dhnyabpu:3781: kāryahetāvapi pūrva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sādhanīyaḥ anantaraṃ ca kāraṇasādhanārtha kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3782: tathā hi- svarūpeṇa niścitameva liṅga jñeyam,
T11dhnyabpu:3785: tato niṣpannāniṣpannayoviruddharmasaṃsargātmako bhedo bhedahetuśca kāraṇabheda iti kuta ekatvam /
T11dhnyabpu:3790: pūrvajena paścānniṣpannasya vyabhicāraḥ= parityāgo yastasya sambhavācca na pūrvaniṣpannasya paścānniṣpannaḥ sādhyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3793: tathā ca siddhasādhanadharma mātranubandha eva svabhāve svabhavahetavaḥ prayoktavyā iti sthitam // 20 //
T11dhnyabpu:3796: yatra dhūma iti dhūmamanūdya tatrāgniriti agnevidhiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3808: 23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sad upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva /
T11dhnyabpu:3810: na caiva mihopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sata upalabdhiḥ rghaṭasyeti anupalabdhiprayogaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3813: san ca śabda utpattimān kṛtako veti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3840: tadanena dṛśyasya sattvaṃ darśanaviṣayatvena vyāptaṃ kathitam,
T11dhnyabpu:3844: tathā ca sādhyanivṛttiḥ sādhananivṛtti niyatatvāt sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā /
T11dhnyabpu:3845: yadi ca dharmiṇi sādhayadharmo na bhaved,
T11dhnyabpu:3849: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād vyāpyasya sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatirbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3850: tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhnābhāve sādhyābhāvo niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ // 23 //
T11dhnyabpu:3855: atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3878: tato vyāpyo 'pi sādhyābhāvo nivartata iti sādhyagati // 24 //
T11dhnyabpu:3888: sādharmyaiṇāpyabhidheyena yukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt sāmarthyāt vaidharmyasya vyatirekasya gatirbhavatīti /
T11dhnyabpu:3893: katham? asati tasmin vyatireke buddhayā vyavasite sādhyena hetoranvayasya buddhayāśyavasitasyābhāvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:3894: sādhye niyataṃ sādhanamanvayavākyādavasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
T11dhnyabpu:3906: yadi sādhyena hetoranvayo na syāt tadā sādhyābhāve 'pi hetorabhāvaḥ katham syāt // 29 //
T11dhnyabpu:3909: yadi svabhāvapratibandha ātmā svarūpeṇa pratibandho na syāt tadā ekanivṛttāvapi aparasya nivṛttirniyamena na syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:3912: sarvasyaiva padārthasya yaḥ ko 'pi pratibandho yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāradvaya evāntarbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3916: katham? asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddhe ranavasāyāt /
T11dhnyabpu:3917: hetvabhāve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyādavasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3918: itarathā hetvabhāve niyato na syāt pratītaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3924: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ // 30 //
T11dhnyabpu:3925: sa ca svabhāvapratibandho dviprakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya /
T11dhnyabpu:3926: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3928: yo yatra pratibaddhastasya sa pratibandhaviṣayo 'rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vāsyat anyasmin prasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3931: 32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3933: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena
T11dhnyabpu:3934: vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśyaṃ
T11dhnyabpu:3940: tadutpattirlakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa tadutpattilakṣaṇa iti vigrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3943: abhāve na tena hetunā kasyacidekasya nivṛtyā aparanivṛttiramidhīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:3948: iti cedāha- yadeva pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvaya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:3949: tasmādekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛta bhavatīti /
T11dhnyabpu:3953: tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:3954: yadi hi sādhanaṃ sādhye pratibaddham bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:3957: tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ pratibandhopadarśanam /
T11dhnyabpu:3961: yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:3964: tathā ca anvaya eva jñāto bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:3967: tasmādekenāpi sapakṣe cāsapakṣe ca sattvāsattvayoḥ khyāpanaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:3968: anvayo mukham= upāyo 'bhidheyatvād yasya tad anvayamukhaṃ vākyam /
T11dhnyabpu:3972: tasmād ekasmin sādhanavākye dvayoranvaya vyatirekayoravaśyameva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3973: 33 anupalabdhāvapi yatsad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata evetyukte 'nupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśamasaditi pratīteranvayadisśiḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:3975: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatirekamukhena karaṇamapi yuktameva,
T11dhnyabpu:3976: tathāpi uktaprakāreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sattvāsattvayorabhidhānameva sattvāsattvapradarśanaṃ bhavatīti ubhayenāpi liṅgena pratyekaṃ kriyate
T11dhnyabpu:3978: tasmādekasminneva prayoge sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca vākyadvayasya prayogo nāvaśyaṃ kāryaḥ // 32 //
T11dhnyabpu:3988: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati cānumāne ubhayatrāi pakṣanirdeśo nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:3989: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:3991: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti // 34 //
T11dhnyabpu:4001: yadi ca sādhanasambhave 'pi sādhyanivṛttirbhavet na sādhanābhāvena vyāptā bhavet /
T11dhnyabpu:4002: ato vyāptiṃ pratipadyamānena sādhanasambhavaḥ sādhyasambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4006: yataśca sādhanaṃ sādhyadharmapratibaddhaṃ tādātmya tadutpattibhyāṃ pratipattavyaṃ dvayorapi prayogayoḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4008: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4011: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4012: 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /
T11dhnyabpu:4013: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4014: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4015: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ praojanam?
T11dhnyabpu:4016: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4018: yadā sāmarthyena pratijñārthapratītirjāyate tadā pratijñāvacanaśravaṇe uparodhenāpi ka āgrahī syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:4023: sādharmyavati prayoge 'pi sāmarthyādeva neha pradeśe ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4025: ityāha- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti anupalambhānuvādaḥ so 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4027: tathā ca sati dṛśyānupalambho 'sadvayavahārayogyatvena vyāpto darśitah /
T11dhnyabpu:4028: nopalabhyate ca ityādinā sādhyadharmiṇi sattvaṃ liṅgasya darśitam /
T11dhnyabpu:4029: yadi ca sādhyadharmastatra sādhyadharmiṇi na bhavet,
T11dhnyabpu:4032: yathā sādharmyavatprayoge tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi neha sadvayavahāraviṣayo 'sti ghaṭa iti bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4039: anena ca sādhyanivṛtiḥ sādhananivṛttyā vyāptā darśitā /
T11dhnyabpu:4041: yathānyo dṛśya upalabhyate na tathātra pradeśe tādṛśa iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4045: yadi ca sādhyadharmaḥ sādhyadharmiṇi na syāt sādhana
T11dhnyabpu:4050: bhidhānārthe pakṣanirdeśe ca doṣaḥ ko 'pi nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:4052: yadi punaḥ sarvathā pakṣanirdeśapratiṣedha evābhirpetaḥ syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:4054: yadi viniścayavacanābhidhāne ca pakṣanirdeśa iti ucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4059: tathā pratyakṣādinā ca na nirākriyate tādṛśo 'rthaḥ pakṣa iti abhidheyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4062: sādhyarūpeṇa vinā anyarūpeṇa na yujyate iti svarūpeṇoktameva sādhyatvenāvagantavyamiti // 39 //
T11dhnyabpu:4067: ataḥ sāmarthyāt nāstyatra ghaṭa iti pratītena pakṣanirdeśaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4068: evaṃ kārya svabhāvahetvorapi samarthyāt sampratyaya iti na pakṣanirdeśaḥ // 36 //
T11dhnyabpu:4076: evambhūtaḥ san pratyakṣādibhiḥ anirākṛto yo 'rthaḥ sa pakṣa ityucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4091: śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na puanratra sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam,
T11dhnyabpu:4097: yaḥ śabdaḥ so 'nityaḥ ityucyamāne tacca cākṣuṣatvaṃ śabde 'siddhamiti sādhyaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4100: kasmānna pakṣa iti ced? āha- atreti /
T11dhnyabpu:4105: sādhanaṃ kathayatā svayaṃ nirdeśyo yo 'rthaḥ sa eva pakṣaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4110: padāntarābhihitasyarthasya viśeṣa dayotayati- iti padāntareṇa viśeṣyavācinā saha nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4116: śabdayānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyam ityanena sādhyatveneṣṭimāha /
T11dhnyabpu:4125: svayamityanena svayaṃ śabdaṃ vyākhyeyamupakṣipya tasyārthamāha- svayamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:4126: svayaṃśabdo nipātaḥ ātmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayantasya ātmanā iti ca tṛtīyāntasyārthe vartate /
T11dhnyabpu:4130: tato yasya vādina ātmā tṛtīyārtha yuktaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4132: na tu svayaṃśabdasya vādinā ityeṣa paryāyaḥ // 42 //
T11dhnyabpu:4136: 44 etena yadayapi kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanamaha,
T11dhnyabpu:4137: taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pīti yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4138: 45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimiccatā so 'nukto pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4139: teneti vādinā nirdeśya eva pakṣa ucyate // 43 //
T11dhnyabpu:4140: kaścit kvacit śāstre sthitaḥ pakṣe kṛtaniścaya eva /
T11dhnyabpu:4142: tathāpi yadi śāstrāduddhṛtya pramāṇikriyate iti śeṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4143: vādī yasmin śāstre sādhanaṃ kathayati taccāstrakāreṇa vitarkaviṣayadharmiṇi yadi bahavo dharmā aṅgīkriyante, tathāpi ca /
T11dhnyabpu:4144: vādinaiva yo dharma sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4145: śāstrakāreroṣṭastu na yasmād vādinā nirdeśyasya pakṣatvamaṅgīkriyate tasmād vādinā śāstrāṅgīkāradvāreṇopakārako yo dharmaḥ pariṣkartumiṣyate sa eva sādhyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4151: anena tadā vādakāle tena vādinā svayaṃ yo dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4158: yaccāstraṃ tena vādinābhyupagataṃ taccāstrakāreṇa tasmin sādhyadharmiṇi anekasya dharmasyābhyupagame sati anyadharmasādhyatvasambhavaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4159: tathā hi- śāstraṃ yenābhyupagataṃ tatsiddho dharmaḥ sarva eva tena sādhya ityasti vipratipattiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4161: anekadharmābhyupagame 'pi sati sa eva sādhyo yo vādinā iṣṭaḥ, nānya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4164: satyamḥ āhopuruṣikayā tu yadayapi kvaciccāstre sthita iti kiñciccāstramabhyupagataḥ sādhanamāha,
T11dhnyabpu:4165: tathāpi ya eva tasyeṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyaḥ iti jñāpanāyedamuktam // 44 //
T11dhnyabpu:4170: atra ātmārthā ityanukte 'pi ātmārthataiva sādhyaṃ bhavatīti /
T11dhnyabpu:4174: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vastu sādhayitumiccatā sādhyatvenopanyasto 'rtha eveṣṭa iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4179: tata eva yasmād vivādaḥ kathamasau vivāda eva sādhyo na syāt // 46 //
T11dhnyabpu:4180: yacca vivādādhikaraṇaṃ tad vacanenānuktamapi sādhyameveṣyata iti katham iti ced?
T11dhnyabpu:4182: vādaḥ prakrāntaḥ- nāsti ātmā ityātmapratiṣedhavādaḥ ātmasattāvādaviruddhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4185: tasyātmārthasya siddhi niścayam iccatā vādinā so 'rthaḥ sādhya ityuktaṃ bhavati- iṣṭaśabdena /
T11dhnyabpu:4186: yat tad ityukta bhavati iti grahaṇamante tadihāpekṣya vākyaṃ samāpayitavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4187: yadyapi parārthānumāne ukta eva sādhyo yuktaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4191: so 'rthaḥ adhikaraṇam= āśrayo yasya sa tadadhikaraṇo vivādaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4193: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yasmād vivādaṃ nirākartumiccatā vādinā sādhanamupanyastam,
T11dhnyabpu:4194: tasmād yad adhikaraṇaṃ vivādasya tadeva sādhyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4195: yato viruddhaṃ vādamapanetuṃ sādhanamukpanyastaṃ taccet na sādhyam,
T11dhnyabpu:4199: cakṣurādiryeṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ te cakṣurādaya iti dharmī /
T11dhnyabpu:4203: śayanam āsanaṃ ca te ādau yasya taccayanāsanādi puruṣopabhogāṅgaṃ saṅghātarūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:4208: 49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti //
T11dhnyabpu:4210: tathā cakṣurādayo 'pi saṅghātarūpatvāt parārthā eveti prayogārthaḥ // 47 //
T11dhnyabpu:4211: asmin prayoge yadayapi cakṣurādaya ātmārthā iti noktam,
T11dhnyabpu:4223: tataḥ sāṅkhayena svavādaviruddhaṃ bauddhavādaṃ hetūkṛtya viruddhavādanirākaraṇāya svavādapratiṣṭhāpanāya ca sādhanamupanyastam /
T11dhnyabpu:4226: śayanāsanādiṣu hi puruṣopabhogāṅgeṣu ātmārthatvenāvvayo na prasiddhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4232: parasyārthakāri vijñānaṃ setsyatīti sāmarthyāt ātmārthatvaṃ sidhyati cakṣurādīnām- iti matvā parārthagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:4234: api tu prativādino vivādāspadatvād vādinaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭam uktamanuktaṃ vā prakaraṇagamyaṃ sādhyam- ityuktaṃ bhavati // 47 //
T11dhnyabpu:4239: etallakṣaṇena yoge 'pyartho na pakṣa iti pradarśanārtham pratipādanāya anirākṛtagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:4241: ityāha- yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca anumānaṃ ca pratīniśca svavacanaṃ ca- etairnirākriyate viparītaḥ sādhyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4243: tatreti / teṣu caturṣu pratyakṣādinirākṛteṣu pratyakṣanirākṛtaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? yathiti /
T11dhnyabpu:4248: tadā so 'rthaḥ pakṣo na bhavatīti pradarśanārthamanirākṛta ityuktam // 48 //
T11dhnyabpu:4257: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti partijñā tu pratyakṣeṇa nirākriyate/
T11dhnyabpu:4258: tathā hi- karṇavijñānasya śabdaprakāśakatvaṃ prāṇībhiḥ sarvaiḥ svayamavagamyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4259: tena śabde śrāvaṇatvasya svakīyajñānena pratīteraśrāvaṇatvaṃ nirākriyate // 49 //
T11dhnyabpu:4260: atra- ghaṭasya nityatvaṃ pratijñātaṃ kṛtādyanumānena nirākriyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4264: yadi kenacit śaśī na candraśabdabhidheyaḥ iti pratijñā kriyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4265: sa tu śaśī candraśabdābhidheya eva iti prasiddhayā nirākriyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4266: api ca sarveṣvartheṣu sarvasya śabdasya vācyatayāpi nirākriyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4275: pratītyā nirākṛtaḥ acandra iti candraśabdavācyo na bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4281: tena vikalpajñānena pratītirūpeṇa śaśinaścandraśabdavācyatvaṃ siddhameva / tathāhi-
T11dhnyabpu:4283: yaccabdākārasaṃsargayogyaṃ tat sāṅketikena śabdena vaktuṃ śakyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4288: tataḥ svabhāvahetusiddhaṃ candraśabdavācyatvam avācyatvasya bādhakaṃ draṣṭavyam // 51 //
T11dhnyabpu:4290: kenacid anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati ityucyamāne tat svavacanena viruddham /
T11dhnyabpu:4294: anumānaṃ ca yadi pramāṇaṃ na syāt vākyaṃ tāvat kutaḥ pramāṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:4301: sa nānumānaṃ pramāṇam ityanena svavācakena vākyena bādhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4302: vākyaṃ hi etat prayujyamānaṃ vaktuḥ śābdapratyayasya sadarthatvamiṣṭaṃ sūcayati /
T11dhnyabpu:4303: tathā hi- madvākyād yo 'rthasampratyayastavotpadyate so 'satyārthaḥ iti darśayan vākyameva noccārayed vaktā,
T11dhnyabpu:4306: yo 'pi hi sarva mithyā bravīmi iti vakti,
T11dhnyabpu:4313: tasmād vākyaprabhavavākyārthālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayannev vaktā vākyamuccārayati /
T11dhnyabpu:4314: tathā ca sati vāhyavastunāntarīyakaṃ śabdaṃ darśayatā śabdajaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārtha darśayitavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4315: tato bāhyārthakāryāccabdādutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ satyārthamādarśayatā kāryaliṅgajamanumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śābdaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4316: tasmāt nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti bruvatā śābdasya pratyayasyāsatrārtho grāhya uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4321: tadevaṃ svavacnānumitena sattvenāsattvaṃ bādhyamānaṃ svavacanena bādhitamuktamityayamatrārthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4333: tenaiva svarūpeṇa vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamana vadayaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4334: atrāgamaviruddha svavacanaviruddhe 'ntabhūta iti sarve pakṣābhāsāścatvāra ityuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:4343: nirākṛtamātrasya ca viparītaṃ pakṣatvena draṣṭavyamityayamartha ukto bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4347: abhiprākāryatvaṃ ca vāstavameva śabdasya tatastadiha na gṛhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4353: api ca, na svābhiprāyanivedanāya śabda uccāryate,
T11dhnyabpu:4357: evaṃ ca sati anirākṛtagrahaṇena anantaroktāścatvāraḥ pakṣavadavabhāsanta iti pakṣābhāsā nirastā bhavanti // 53 //
T11dhnyabpu:4358: samprati pakṣalakṣaṇapadāni yeṣāṃ vyavaccedakāni teṣāṃ vyavaccedena yādṛśaḥ pakṣārtho labhyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4359: taṃ darśayituṃ vyavaccedayāna saṃkṣipya darśayati- evamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:4361: siddhasya viparyayeṇa viparītvena hetunā sādhyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4362: yasmādarthāt siddho 'rtho viparītaḥ sa sādhya ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4387: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ yogyamekamapi yadayuktamai vādiprativādinorasiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā syat,
T11dhnyabpu:4390: yaścāyaṃ pañcabhirvyavccedayai rahito 'rthosiddho 'sādhanaṃ vādinaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭa ukto 'nukto vā pramāṇairanirākṛtaḥ sādhyaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4391: sa evāso svarūpeṇaiva svayamiṣṭo 'nirākṛta etaiḥ padairukta ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4392: yaścāyaṃ sādhayḥ sa pakṣa iti ucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4398: prasaṅgāgataṃ ca pakṣalakṣaṇamabhidhāya hetvābhāsān vaktukāmasteṣāṃ prastāvaṃ racayati- trirūpetyādinā /
T11dhnyabpu:4399: etaduktaṃ bhavati- trirūpaliṅgaṃ vaktukāmena sphuṭaṃ tad vaktavyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4400: evaṃ ca tat sphuṭamuktaṃ bhavati yadi tacca,
T11dhnyabpu:4412: kasya? ityāha- pratipāvayasya prativādinaḥ pratipādakasya ca vādino hetvābhāsaḥ // 56 //
T11dhnyabpu:4413: 57 ekasya svarūpasya dharmisambandhasyāsiddhau sandehe vāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:4414: 58 yathā- anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvamubhayāsiddham //
T11dhnyabpu:4415: 59 cetanāstaravaḥ iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādayasiddham /
T11dhnyabpu:4421: tasyāsiddhau sandehe cāsiddho nāma hetvābhāso bhavati // 57 //
T11dhnyabpu:4424: yadi digambarairuktam-vṛkṣāḥ cetanāḥ sarvatvagapaharaṇai maraṇāt iti bauddhaiḥ prayogate,
T11dhnyabpu:4428: atha kasyaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau sandehe vā kisaṃjñako hetvabhāsaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:4431: dharmiṇi sattvaṃ hetoḥ tasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhasaṃjñako hetvābhāsaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4440: anityaḥ śabda ityanityatvaviśiṣṭe śabde sāvye cākṣuṣatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ śabde dvayorapi vādiprativādinora siddham // 58 //
T11dhnyabpu:4443: sarvā tvak sarvatvak tasyā apaharaṇe sati maraṇaṃ digambarairūpanyastaṃ prativādino bauddhasya asiddham /
T11dhnyabpu:4446: vijñānaṃ cendriyaṃ cāyuśceti dvandvaḥ tatra vijñānaṃ cakṣurādijanitam /
T11dhnyabpu:4447: rūpādivijñānotpattyā yadanumitaṃ kāryāntarbhūtaṃ cakṣurgolakādisthitaṃ rūpaṃ tad indriyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4452: sa lakṣaṇaṃ tattvaṃ yasya tat tathoktamḥ tathābhūtasya maraṇasyānena bauddhena pratijñātatvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:4453: 60 acetanāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddham //
T11dhnyabpu:4454: vijñānaṃ ca indriyāṇi ca āyuśceti vigrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4456: sa eva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya maraṇasya tad vijñānendriyāyunirodhalakṣaṇaṃ maraṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:4459: tādṛśaṃ hi maraṇaṃ vṛkṣeṣu na sambhavatīti // 59 //
T11dhnyabpu:4462: tadā sukhādiṣūtpattiranityatvaṃ vā sāṅkhayānāṃ svayamevāsiddhamḥ tasya hi kimapi notpadyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4473: satyamḥ kevalaṃ vijñānasattayā vyāptaṃ yat maraṇaṃ tadiha hetuḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4478: digambarastu sādhyena vyāptavyāptaṃ vā maraṇamavivicya maraṇamātraṃ hetumāha /
T11dhnyabpu:4479: tadasya vādino hetubhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ na jñātam /
T11dhnyabpu:4481: śoṣarūpasya maraṇasya taruṣu darśanāt prativādinastu jñātam,
T11dhnyabpu:4489: ya utpattimanto 'nityā vā te na cetanāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4491: tathā ca- utpatti manto 'nityā vā sukhādayaḥ tasmādacetanāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4493: atra cotpattimattvamanityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetuḥ na yugapat /
T11dhnyabpu:4494: tacca dvayamapi sāṃkhyasya vādino na siddham /
T11dhnyabpu:4496: tena yaḥ parasya siddhaḥ sa heturvaktavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4513: asau vāṣpo vā dhūlirvā kuhelikā vā?
T11dhnyabpu:4522: yadi tvanityatvotpattimattvayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ vādinā jñātaṃ syāt,
T11dhnyabpu:4531: tatra hi heturvartamāno gamakatvenāśrīyate tasyaśrayaṇasya sandehe sandigdhaḥ // 61 //
T11dhnyabpu:4537: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā dhūmo 'pi vāṣpāditvena sandigdho bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:4545: parvato paribhāgena tiryaṅnirgatena praccādito bhūbhāgo nikuñjaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4550: 65 dhamyaṃsiddhāvapyasiddhaḥ- yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sadhye sarvatro palabhyamānaguṇatvam //
T11dhnyabpu:4551: kathaṃ sandigdha iti cet? āha- tadeti /
T11dhnyabpu:4553: sa hi mayūradhvaniḥ kasmānnikuñjapradeśānniḥ saratītyatra saṃśaya eva / 64 //
T11dhnyabpu:4560: tathāhi- sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ yasya dharma uktaḥ sa ātmaiva nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:4563: te ca sarvadeśasya eva devadatta upalabhyante /
T11dhnyabpu:4570: tasya deśaḥ sa ucyate yasmād deśādāgaccati kekāyitam /
T11dhnyabpu:4572: nirantareṣu bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu satsu yadā kekāyitāpātanikuñje vibhramaḥ- kimasmānnikuñjāt kekāyitamāgatam?
T11dhnyabpu:4579: sarvatra deśe upalabhyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkheccārāgadveṣādayo guṇā yasyātmanastasya bhāvastattvam /
T11dhnyabpu:4584: kathaṃ darkṣiṇāpathe upalabdhaḥ dukhādayo madhyadeśe upalabhyeran tasmāt sarvagata ātmā /
T11dhnyabpu:4586: kimuta sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ sidhyet tasya ityasiddhau hetvābhāsaḥ pūrvamāśrayaṇasandehena dharmiṇi sandeha uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4590: 67 yathā śabdasyānityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe vā vartamānaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:4595: śabdo 'nityaḥ prameyatvāt iti sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatrāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:4596: śabdo na prayatnāntarīyakaḥ anityatvāt iti sādhye,
T11dhnyabpu:4597: anityatyatvaṃ sapakṣasya ekadeśe vipakṣasya ca sarvatraivāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:4609: ādi śabdādaprayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca parigṛhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4614: śabdasya dharmiṇo 'nityatvādike dharme sādhye prametvādiko dharmo 'naikāntikaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4620: anityavāda vidyudākāśavad ghaṭavacca ityanityatvaṃ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti vidyudādāvasti,
T11dhnyabpu:4630: ubhayorekadeśe ākāśe karmaṇi ca vartateḥ paramāṇau tu
T11dhnyabpu:4632: 69 yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavāvṛttikaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:4633: sādhye, anityatvaṃ upakṣasya sarvatra vipakṣasya caikadeśe 'sti /
T11dhnyabpu:4640: kenacid vivakṣitaḥ- kaścit puruṣo na sarvajño vaktṛtvāt tathā rāgādimān vā vaktṛtvādeva iti ucyamāne tasya vaktṛtvādidharmo 'naikāntika eva
T11dhnyabpu:4643: vipakṣād vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā asyeti sa sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4645: sarvajñaḥ kaścid vaktā na dṛśyate iti adarśane 'pi vyatireka siddhirna bhavati // 69 //
T11dhnyabpu:4646: sapakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau ca vipakṣaikadeśe na vartateḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4661: sa yasyāsti sa rāgādimān iti dvitīyaṃ sādhyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4663: tato 'sarvajñatve rāgādimattve vā sādhye prakṛte vaktṛtvam= vacanaśaktiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4671: 70 sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasyānu palambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena sandehahetutvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:4673: 71 vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvācca yaḥ sarvajñaḥsa vaktā na bhavatītya darśane 'pi vyatireko na siddhayati, sandehāt //
T11dhnyabpu:4679: adṛśyaviṣayānupalambhaḥ saṃśayasyaiva heturiti asarvajñaparyayāt sarvajñāt vaktṛtvalakṣaṇahetornivṛttiḥ sandigdhaiva // 70 //
T11dhnyabpu:4685: tasmāt- sarvajñasya vakturadarśane 'pi vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayovirodhābhāvād vaktṛtvasya sarvajñatvād vyāvṛttiriti na sidhyati sandehasattvāt //
T11dhnyabpu:4688: ata eva sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevamprakārasya evañjātīyasya anupalambhasya sandehahetutvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:4689: kutaḥ? ityāha- adṛśya ātbhā viṣayo yasya tasya bhāvo 'dṛśyātmaviṣayatvam /
T11dhnyabpu:4697: virodhābhāvācca kāraṇāt vyatireko na sidhyati- iti sambandhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4698: vyāptimantaṃ vyatirekaṃ darśayati- yaḥ sarvajña iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4699: sadhyābhāvarūpaṃ sarvajñatvamanūdya sa vaktā na bhavati iti sādhanasya vaktṛtvasyābhāvo vidhīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4700: tena sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyatatvāt sādhanābhāvena vyāpta ukta iti /
T11dhnyabpu:4701: vyāptimānīdṛśo vyatireko virodhe sati vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ sidhyet /
T11dhnyabpu:4712: yatra yaḥ ko 'pi virodha upalabhyate sa sarva eva prakāradvaye 'ntarbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4726: avikalāni samagrāṇi kāraṇāni yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4733: evaṃ tarhi avikalakaraṇasyāpi yatkṛtāt kāraṇavaikalyādabhāvastena virodhagatiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4735: yo yasya viruddhaḥ sa tasya kiñcitkara /
T11dhnyabpu:4736: eva tathāhi- śītasparśasya janako bhūtvā śītasparśāntarajananaśakti pratibadhnan śītasparśasya nivartako viruddhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4741: tasmād yo yasya nivartakaḥ sa taṃ yadi paraṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇe nivartayati,
T11dhnyabpu:4745: tatrāloko gatidharmā krameṇa jalataraṅganyāyena deśamākrāman yadāndhakāranirantaramālokakṣaṇaṃ janayati,
T11dhnyabpu:4748: asamarthe nivṛtte taddeśe jāyata āloka ityevaṃ krameṇālokenāndhakāro 'paneyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4751: tadā yataḥ kṣaṇādandhakāradeśasyā lokasya janakaḥ kṣaṇa utapdayate,
T11dhnyabpu:4755: yathā śītoṣṇasparśayoḥ śītasyāvikalakāraṇasya sato yadā uṣṇatvāpariniṣpattistada śītatvanivṛttiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4757: parasparaparihāreṇa sthitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni parasparaparihārasthitalakṣāṇāni,
T11dhnyabpu:4764: tatastṛtīye kṣaṇe nivṛtto viruddho yadi śīghraṃ nivartate /
T11dhnyabpu:4767: yadyapi ca na santāno nāma vastu,
T11dhnyabpu:4771: yataḥ satsu dahanakṣaṇeṣu pravṛttā api śītakṣaṇā nivṛttidharmāṇo bhavantīti santānayornivartyanivartakatvanimitte
T11dhnyabpu:4772: ca virodhe sthite sarveṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ satyapyekadeśāvasthānābhāve na virodhaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4776: tato 'pavarakaikadeśasthā pradīpaprabhāndhakāranikaṭavartinyapi nāndhakāraṃ nivartayatiḥ andhakārākrāntāyāṃ diśyālokakṣaṇāntarajananāsāmarthyat
T11dhnyabpu:4777: kāraṇasāmarthyahetutvakṛtaṃ santānaniṣṭhameva virodhaṃ darśayatā bhavatā iti kṛtam /
T11dhnyabpu:4778: bhavataḥ prabandhena pravartamānasya śītasparśasantānasyābhāvo 'nyasyoṣṇasantānasya bhāve satīti /
T11dhnyabpu:4779: ye tvāhuḥ- na virodho vāstavaḥ iti,
T11dhnyabpu:4780: ta idaṃ taktavyāḥ- yathā na niṣpanne kārye kaścijjanya janakabhāvo nāma dviṣṭho 'sti,
T11dhnyabpu:4783: tadvanna nivṛtte vastuni kaścid dviṣṭho nāma virodho 'sti /
T11dhnyabpu:4791: tena sthitaṃ lakṣaṇam= rūpaṃ yayoḥv tadbhāvaḥ parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatā, tayā /
T11dhnyabpu:4792: 76 sa ca dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorna sambhavati //
T11dhnyabpu:4794: vaktṛtvasya hi iha yasmin pariccidyamāne yad vyavaccidyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4810: ato na niyatākāram yataḥ kṣaṇikatvaparihāreṇa na kiñcid dṛśyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4814: tato dṛsṭaṃ kalpitaṃ vā niyataṃ rūpamanyatrāsadityavasīyate, nāniyatam /
T11dhnyabpu:4824: tathā hi- abhāvo 'pi piśāco 'pi yadā pīte niṣedbhūmiṣyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4825: tadā dṛśyātmataya niṣedhya iti dṛśyatvamabhyupagamya dṛśyānupalabdhereva niṣedhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4826: tathā ca sati rūpe pariccidyamāna ekasmistadabhāvo dṛśyo vyavaccidyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4829: tataḥ dvapracyutivat pracyutimanto 'pi vyavaccinnā iti ye parasparaparihārasthitarūpāḥ sarve te 'nena niṣiddhakatvāditi /
T11dhnyabpu:4840: sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvaṃ ca sarvajñatvaṃ ca tayorna sambhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4847: virodhābhāve ca aviruddhavadvaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvāvaviparyayeṇopalabhyata iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:4849: yatra viruddhatvena nābhidhānaṃ tatra vastunoranupalabdhāvapi nābhāvaniścayaḥ sambhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:4876: yato yadi vacanādi rāgādīnāṃ kārya syād,
T11dhnyabpu:4891: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantaroyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:4894: akāraṇasya tasya nivṛttau kathaṃ vacanādernivṛttiḥ syāt? // 79 //
T11dhnyabpu:4895: tathāhi yasmād vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ ko 'pi virodho nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:4897: tatmāt asarvajñanivṛttyā rāgādinivṛttyā vā vacananivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
T11dhnyabpu:4905: ityāśaṅkayāha- arthāntarasya cākaraṇasya nivṛtau sahacāritvadarśanamātreṇa nānyasya vacanādenivṛttiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4908: tasmādasarvajñatvaviparyayād vipakṣāt sarvajñatvād rāgādimattvaviparyayādarāgādimattvāt sandigdho vyatireko vacanāde /
T11dhnyabpu:4911: dvayordvayo rūpayorasiddhisandehe hetudoṣān vaktukāma āha- dvayordvayoriti /
T11dhnyabpu:4920: prayatnāntarīyakaśabdena hi prayatnānantaraṃ janmajñānaṃ ca prayatnānantarīyakamucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:4930: yadi kṛtakatvena prayatnāntarīyaktvena vā nityatvaṃ sādhyate,
T11dhnyabpu:4950: anitye vipakṣe eva sattvaṃ niścitamiti viparyayasiddhiḥ // 84 //
T11dhnyabpu:4952: ityāha- etau ca sādhyasya nityatvasya viparyayam anityatvaṃ sādhaytaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4958: ato 'nya iṣṭavighātakṛdābhyāmiti darśannāha- nanau ca tṛtīyo 'pi viruddha uktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:4960: tṛtīyo 'yamiṣṭasya śabdenānupāttasya vighātaṃ karoti viparyayasādhanāditi iṣṭavighātakṛt // 86 //
T11dhnyabpu:4963: paro 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ parārthaḥ prayojakaḥ saṃskārya upakartavyo yeṣāṃ te parārthā iti sādhyam /
T11dhnyabpu:4979: iṣṭaṃ ca tasya tad asaṃhṛtapārārthya ceti vigrahaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:4986: kṛtakatvaprayatnāntarīyakavalakṣaṇaṃ hetunityatve sādhye sādhyaviparyayasādhanād viruddha ityuktam /
T11dhnyabpu:4987: ayamapi sādhyaviparyayasādhanāt tābhyāṃ samāna eva viruddhah // 91 //
T11dhnyabpu:4989: yataḥ śayanāsanādayaḥ saṅghātarūpāḥ puruṣasya bhogino bhavanti upakārakā iti parārthā ucyante // 87 //
T11dhnyabpu:4996: ātmā asti iti bruvāṇaḥ sāṅkhyaḥ kuta etad iti paryanuyukto bauddhena,
T11dhnyabpu:5000: yasmād yo yasyopakārakaḥ sa tasya janakaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5001: janyamānaśca yugapat krameṇa vā bhavati saṃhṛtaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5004: sa kasmād vāttikakāreṇa satā tvayā noktaḥ // 89 //
T11dhnyabpu:5010: yasmād ayam iṣṭavighātakṛd ābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ sādhyaviparyasya sādhanatvena na bhidyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5013: uktaviparyayaṃ tu sādhayatu vā mā vā,
T11dhnyabpu:5017: 94 yathā vītarāgaḥ kaścit sarvajño vā vaktṛtvāditi /
T11dhnyabpu:5023: tasmāt kathamayaṃ tābhyāṃ samāna iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:5025: yacceṣṭaṃ yaccoktaṃ taddvayoḥ sādhyatve viśeṣaḥ ko 'pi nāstītyetaduktameva // 92 //
T11dhnyabpu:5032: tathā hi sarvajñatve sādhye asarvajño vipakṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5036: tasmāt tayoḥ kutrāpi vacanamasti nāsti veti sandigdhameva /
T11dhnyabpu:5037: tathahi- dṛṣṭāntatvena yaḥ puruṣa uktaḥ sa ki sarvajña san vaktā,
T11dhnyabpu:5043: yasmādiṣṭoktayoḥ parasparasmāt sādhyatvena na kaścid viśeṣo bheda iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5046: yacca prakaraṇāpannaṃ tat sādhaneccayā viṣayīkṛte sādhyamiṣṭamuktam,
T11dhnyabpu:5055: vigato rāgo yasya sa vītarāga ityakaṃ sādhyam /
T11dhnyabpu:5059: svātmanyeva sarāge ca asarvajñe ca vipakṣe vaktṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
T11dhnyabpu:5063: vacanāderatīndriyagamyasyāpi tatra atīndriyayoḥ sarvajñavītarāgayoḥ sattvamasattvaṃ va sandigdham /
T11dhnyabpu:5064: tataśca na jñāyate kiṃ vaktṛtvāt sarvajñaḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:5068: 98 na hi sātmakanirātmakābhyāmanyo rāśirasti yatrāyaṃ prāṇādirvarteta //
T11dhnyabpu:5083: samprati dvayoreva sandehe 'naikāntikaṃ vaktumāha- anayoreva anvayavyatirekayoḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5090: prāṇāḥ= śvāsādaya ādiryasyonmeṣanimeṣādeḥ prāṇidharmasya sa prāṇādiḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5099: yābhyāṃ hyākārābhyāṃ sarva vastu na saṃgṛhyate tayorākārayorna saṃśayah /
T11dhnyabpu:5100: prakārāntarasambhave hi pakṣadharmo dharmiṇamaviyuktaṃ dvayorekena dharmeṇa darśayituṃ na śaknuyāt,
T11dhnyabpu:5104: niyataṃ tu bhāvaṃ darśayan samyag hetuviruddho vā syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5108: sadbhāvaniścaye tu yadyekatra niyatasattāniścayo heturivuddho vā syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5125: tathā hi- yasmin ātmano vṛttistat sātmakam /
T11dhnyabpu:5129: yadyapi tābhyāṃ vyatireko 'siddhaḥ tathāpi tatrānvaya evāstviti ced?
T11dhnyabpu:5131: prāṇādimattvasya sātmake nirātmake vā sattvamiti niścayo na śakyate kartum // 100 //
T11dhnyabpu:5150: prakārābhyāṃ sarvavastusaṃgrahaṃ pratipādya dvitīyamāha- nāpyanayoḥ sātmakānātmakayormadhya ekatra sātmake 'sātmake vā vṛtte sadbhāvasya niścayo 'sti /
T11dhnyabpu:5151: dvāvapi rāśī tyaktvā na vartate prāṇādiḥ vastudharmatvāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5154: tadāha- sātmakatvenānātmakatvena vā viśeṣeṇa yukte prasiddhe niścite vastuni prāṇāderdharmasya sarvavastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayorekatra niyatasadbhāvasya asiddhe ranaikāntikaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5157: 102 tasmājjīvaccarīrasambandhī ghrāṇādiḥ sātmakādanātmakācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvenāsidhestābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate //
T11dhnyabpu:5173: pakṣadharmaśca bhavan sarvaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā bhavatyanaikāntikaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5176: yasmāt tayorekatrāpi na nivṛttiniścayaḥ tasmāt tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5177: vastudharme hi sarvavastuvyāpinoḥ prakārayorekatraniyatasadbhāvo niścitaḥ prakārāntarānnivarteta /
T11dhnyabpu:5178: ata evāha- sātmakādanātmakatvācca sarvasmād vastuno vyavṛttatvenāsiddhariti /
T11dhnyabpu:5180: tata etāvadavasātuṃ śakyam- sātmakādanātmakād vā kiyato nivṛttaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5184: ityāha- na tatra sātmake 'nātmake vārthe 'nveti anvayavān prāṇādiḥ // 103 //
T11dhnyabpu:5187: vastudharmatayā tayordvayorekatra vā vartata ityavasitaḥ prāṇādiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5188: na tu sātmaka eva nirātmaka eva vā vartata iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ // 104 //
T11dhnyabpu:5189: nanu ca prativādino na kiñcit sātmakamasti,
T11dhnyabpu:5190: tato 'sya hetorna sātmake 'nvayo na vyatireka ityanvayavyatirekayorabhavaniścayaḥ sātmake,
T11dhnyabpu:5195: sattvaniścayābhāve 'pi asattvaniścayaḥ kathaṃ na syāditi cet?
T11dhnyabpu:5199: yadi tayoḥ parasparābhāvarūpeṇa sthitistadā yatrānvayābhāvaniścayastatra vyatirekasattvaniścayo 'vaśyambhavī /
T11dhnyabpu:5202: yatra ca tadasattvaṃ neti niścayastatra bhāvaniścayaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5206: sattvaniścayābhāve 'pi asattvaniścayaḥ kathaṃ na syāditi cet?
T11dhnyabpu:5217: ekasya anvayasya vyatirekasya vā yo 'bhāvaniścayaḥ so 'parasya dvitīyasya bhāvaniścayanāntarīyakaḥ bhāvaniścayasyāvyabhivārī,
T11dhnyabpu:5228: yasya vyavaccedena yat pariccedayate tat tatparihāreṇa vyavasthitam /
T11dhnyabpu:5231: abhāvo hi nīrūpo yādṛśo vikalpena darśitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5234: 109 evameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāmekaikasya dvayordvayorvā rūpayorasiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogamasiddhaviruddhānaikāntikāstrayo hetvābhāsāḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:5236: anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sandehe satyapi kasmādanaikāntikatvameva syāditi cet?
T11dhnyabpu:5253: nirātmakaṃ ca vastuḥ tathāpi tayorna prāṇāderanvayavyatirekayorabhāvaniścayaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5254: ekatra vastuni ekasya vastuno yugapad bhāvābhavavirodhāt tayorabhāvaniścayāyogāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5255: na ca prativādayanurodhāt sātmakānātmake vastunī sadasatī,
T11dhnyabpu:5272: sapakṣavipaksayorhi sadasattvasandehe na sādhyasya na viruddhasya siddhiḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5273: na ca sātmakānātmakābhyāṃ paraḥ prakāraḥ sambhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5274: tataḥ prāṇādimattvād dharmiṇī jīvaccarīre saṃśaya ātmabhāvābhāvayoḥ- ityanaikāntikaḥ prāṇādiriti // 108 //
T11dhnyabpu:5275: trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāmasiddhau sandehe ca hetudoṣānupapādyopasaṃharannāha- eva-
T11dhnyabpu:5287: yadā- viruddhaścasau na vyabhicarituṃ śīlaṃ cāsyeti viruddhāvyabhicārī /
T11dhnyabpu:5294: kathamasambhava iti cet? āha- na hīti /
T11dhnyabpu:5297: eṣāṃ madhya ekaikaṃ rūpaṃ yadā asiddhaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā bhavati,
T11dhnyabpu:5298: dve dvau vāsiddhe sandigdhe vā bhavataḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5301: yasyāsiddhau sandehe vā yo hetvābhāso yujyate sa tasyāsiddheḥ sandehācca vyavasthāpyata iti yasya yasya yena yena yogo yathāyogamiti // / 109
T11dhnyabpu:5303: hetvantarasādhitasya viruddhaṃ yat tanna vyabhicaratīti viruddhābhicārī /
T11dhnyabpu:5304: yadi vā viruddhaścāsau sādhanāntarasiddhasya dharmasya viruddhasādhanāt,
T11dhnyabpu:5315: pramāṇasiddhe hi trairūpye prastute sa eva hetvābhāsaḥ sambhavati yasya pramāṇasiddhaṃ rūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:5328: tathā hi śiśapayā vṛkṣasaṃsiddhau vijātīyavṛkṣasādhanaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇasya dvitīyasyasambhavaḥ // 112 //
T11dhnyabpu:5330: astu tarhi aparatra sambhava iti cet?
T11dhnyabpu:5332: triṣu hetuṣu anantabhūtamavyabhicārihetvantaraṃ nāsti yasmin viruddhāvyabhicārisambhavaḥ // 113 //
T11dhnyabpu:5335: yatra atibaddhena pramāṇena na nirṇayastad avastudarśanabalapravṛttamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:5343: sa kathamātmakāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ parityajya bhaved,
T11dhnyabpu:5353: yasmād vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne na sambhavati tasmād āgamāśrayānumānamāśritya viruddhāvyabhicāyuktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5354: āgamasiddhaṃ hi yasyānumānasya liṅgatrairūpyaṃ tasyāgama āśrayaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5359: tataḥ pravṛttam apramāṇād vikalpamātrād vyavasthitaṃ trairūpyamāgamasiddhamanumānasya,
T11dhnyabpu:5366: 117 tatrodāharaṇam- yat sarvadeśasthitaḥ svasambandhibhiyugapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam yathākāśam /
T11dhnyabpu:5367: abhisambadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaḥ svasambandhibhiyu gapat sāmānyamiti //
T11dhnyabpu:5371: tarhi āgamāśrayānumāne 'pi tasya kathaṃ sambhava iti ced?
T11dhnyabpu:5373: sarvaiśca śāstrakāraistaddarśanānutpannā api kecana arthāḥ svabhāvaviparyayeṇābhihitā bavanti /
T11dhnyabpu:5376: tarhi vastubalena pravṛttirapi kasmānneṣyate iti cet/
T11dhnyabpu:5383: tathā svabhāva- kārya anupalambhahetavaste vyāvsthitā teṣu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ kutaḥ sambhavaḥ // 116 //
T11dhnyabpu:5386: yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ distasya vicāreṣu prakrānteṣu āgamāśrayamanumānaṃ sambhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5402: avasthitaṃ paramārthasadvastu tadanatikrāntā yathāvasthitā vastusthitiḥ= vyavasthā yeṣāṃ te yathāvasthidavastusthitayaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5403: te hi yathā vastu sthitaṃ tathā sthitāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5410: ta eva svasya ca sambandhinaḥ svasamtandhinaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5411: yadapi vastu sarvadeśāvasthitasvasambandhibhiyu gapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatameva dṛṣṭam /
T11dhnyabpu:5413: ākāśaṃ hi sarvadeśāvasthitasvasambandhibhiryu gapadabhisambadhyate tacca sarvagatameveṣṭam /
T11dhnyabpu:5416: sāmānyasya sambandhino hi vyaktiviśeṣāḥ sarveṣu vidyamānāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5421: tatsambandhināṃ svabhāvamātramanubandhu śīlaṃ yasyā sā tatsambandhisvabhavamātrānubandhinī /
T11dhnyabpu:5424: taddeśannihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya sa taddeśasanni hitasvabhāvaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5428: yat sarvasmit deśe 'vasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhiryu gapadabhisambaddhayate iti sarvadeśāvasthitairabhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sāmānyasya anūdaya sarvagatatvaṃ vidhīyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5429: tena yugapadabhisambadhyamānatvaṃ sarvagatatve niyataṃ tena vyāptaṃ kathyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5430: iha sāmānyaṃ kaṇādamaharṣiṇā niṣkriyaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ coktam /
T11dhnyabpu:5431: yugapacca sarvaiḥ svaiḥ sambandhibhiḥ samavāyena sambaddham /
T11dhnyabpu:5432: tatra pailukena kaṇādaśiṣyeṇa vyaktiṣu vyaktirahiteṣu ca deśeṣu sāmānyaṃ sthitaṃ sādhayituṃ pramāṇamidamupanyastam /
T11dhnyabpu:5435: ākāśamapi hi sarvadeśāvasthitaivṛkṣādibhiḥ svasaṃyogibhiryugapadabhisambadhyamānaṃ sarvagataṃ ca /
T11dhnyabpu:5439: teṣāṃ sarvadeśāvasthitānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ sambandhī sāmānyasya svabhāvaḥ sa eva tatsambandhisvabhāvamātram,
T11dhnyabpu:5443: taddeśe sannihitaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat taddeśannihitasva-
T11dhnyabpu:5444: 119 na hi yo yatra nāsti sa taddśamātmanā vyāpnotīti svabhāvahetuprayoga iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5445: 120 dvitīyo 'pi prayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaprāptaṃ sannipalamyate na tat tannāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:5448: ayamanupalambhah svabhāvaśca parasparaviruddhāsāthanāde katra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:5449: sarvagatatvenava hi sambandhino vyāpyante ityetacca kasmāditi cet? āha- ya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5450: yaśca yatra nāsti tasya taddeśavyāpannaṃ kathaṃ śakyam?
T11dhnyabpu:5452: sa deśo yasya sa taddeśa iti yasmin deśe sa nāsti taddeśasambandhinaṃ sa na saknoti vyāpayitumīt śeṣaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5463: yo yatra deśe nāsti sa deśo yasya sa taddeśaḥ taṃ na vyāpnotītyātmanā svarūpeṇa /
T11dhnyabpu:5464: iha sāmānyasya tadvatāṃ ca samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhah,
T11dhnyabpu:5466: tena yatra tay samavetaṃ tat tadātmīyena rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat samavāyirūpa deśe svātmānaṃ niveśayati /
T11dhnyabpu:5469: tasmād yat tatra samavetaṃ tat tad dravyaṃ vyāpnuvadātmā taddeśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5471: taddeśasattābhāve tadvayāpanābhāvāt vyāpanalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyasambandho na syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5476: etena dṛśyānupalabdhimanūdaya na tat tatrāsti ityasadvayavahāryatvaṃ vihitam /
T11dhnyabpu:5480: tāvatā nārthapratītiriti na pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
T11dhnyabpu:5492: prākca svabhāvahetunā sarvasarvagatatvaṃ sādhitamiti dvābhyāṃ parasparaviruddhārthasādhanāt
T11dhnyabpu:5494: anubaddhatvāt sarvasarvagatatvameva veti anubhavādekasminneva sāmānye sandehī jāyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5498: pūrva hetorlakṣaṇatrayaṃ yaduktaṃ tenaiva rūpatrayeṇa sādhyārthasiddhirbhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5499: tena dṛṣṭānto nāma pṛthak sādhanāvayavo nāsti /
T11dhnyabpu:5503: dṛśyamapi kasyāñcid vyaktī gosāmānyamaśvādiṣu vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe nopalabhyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5505: ayamanupalambhaḥ pūrvoktaśca svabhāvaḥ parasya viruddhau yavathau tayoḥ sādhanāt tāvekasmin dharmiṇi saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5507: ekena cātra vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe sattvam /
T11dhnyabpu:5509: na caikasyaikasaikatra sattvamasattvaṃ ca yuktamḥ tayovirodhāt /
T11dhnyabpu:5510: tadāgamasiddhasya sāmānyasya sarvagatatvāsarvagatatvayoḥ sādhyayoreto viruddhāvyabhicāriṇī jātau /
T11dhnyabpu:5514: tataḥ śāstrakārreṇaiva viruddhavyaptatvamapaśyatā viruddhavyāptī dharmāvuktvā viruddhāvyabhicāryavakāśo datta iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5517: nanu ca sādhanāvayavatvād yathā hetava uktāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5519: 122 hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣācca sarvato vyāvṛtto rūpamuktamabhedena /
T11dhnyabpu:5527: prayogamātra etadeva hetorlakṣaṇam- sapakṣa eva sattvam ityevarūpam /
T11dhnyabpu:5528: tathā sarvasmād vipakṣād vyāvṛtiḥ ityevaṃrūpam ca /
T11dhnyabpu:5529: viśeṣeṇa ca hetorlakṣaṇam- kāryahetorjanma pradarśanīyam ityuktam,
T11dhnyabpu:5534: evaṃ ca darśayatā viśeṣeṇa kathayatā ityarthaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5536: bhāsāḥ, tathā sādhanāvayatvād dṛṣṭāntā vaktavyāḥ tatprasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntā bhāṣāḥ tat kathaṃ noktāḥ?
T11dhnyabpu:5546: tena nāsya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣaṇāt pṛthagucyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5550: api tu na hetoḥ pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma /
T11dhnyabpu:5552: ata evoktam- nāsya pṛthag lakṣaṇamucyate iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5557: abhidheyaṃ vā yasya dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya, tat tathā /
T11dhnyabpu:5571: na hyanyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayitum /
T11dhnyabpu:5576: tathaiva vyāvṛtti kathayatāpyavaśyaṃ yathā jalam ityābhidheyam /
T11dhnyabpu:5578: anena svabhāvahetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca yathā vaktavyaṃ tathā darśyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5579: iha yadi yathā ghaṭaḥ iti nocyate tadā sapakṣasattvameva kathayituṃ na śakyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5583: tathāhi yadi yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrāvaśyaṃ nityatvam,
T11dhnyabpu:5590: ataḥ punarapi viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau /
T11dhnyabpu:5592: janmani hi jñāte kāryasya sapakṣe eva sattvam,
T11dhnyabpu:5600: sādhanasya yadā svabhāvo jñāto bhavati tadā svabhāvahetoḥ- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
T11dhnyabpu:5606: tacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā eva darśanīyam- iti sambandhaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5611: asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5615: vyāptiḥ / asmiścārthe darśite eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5617: sapakṣatvaṃ darśayatā yadi yathā mahānasaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti vā nocyate,
T11dhnyabpu:5619: yadi ca vipakṣāsattvaṃ darśayatā yathā jalam yathā ākāśam iti vā nicyate,
T11dhnyabpu:5626: kāraṇasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam ityeṣa niyama eva tatkāryatāniyamaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5630: yadā yathoktanyāyena kvacid dharmiṇi hetuḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇato viśeṣalakṣaṇataścocyate,
T11dhnyabpu:5636: anityatvābhāve na bhavatyena kṛtakatvamiti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5638: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyani vṛttau nivṛttirniyatā darśanīyā /
T11dhnyabpu:5643: yasmādanyathā sāmānya lakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
T11dhnyabpu:5646: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre sadasatve darśite bhavataḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5650: saiva niyamo yatastatkāryatāyā dhūmo dahane niyataḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5652: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāpti viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum /
T11dhnyabpu:5653: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvastādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jḥātavyam,
T11dhnyabpu:5654: tasmād vyāptisādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśayatā sādharmyadṛṣṭānto darśanīyaḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntastu prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvapratipattyartham
T11dhnyabpu:5665: yatra ca sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo nirdiśyate sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ // 122 //
T11dhnyabpu:5666: yasmād yadā hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayonirdeśaḥ kriyate sa nirduṣṭhadṛṭānta ityucyate
T11dhnyabpu:5667: tasmād yatra tallakṣaṇayornirdeśo na sambhavati sa dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati // 123 //
T11dhnyabpu:5675: tasmād dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa na hetoranvayo vyatireko vā śakyo darśayitum /
T11dhnyabpu:5676: ato heturūpākhyānādeva hetorvyāptisādhanasya pramāṇasya darśakaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5677: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhave hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca darśitaṃ bhavati /
T11dhnyabpu:5679: yo 'yamartho vyāpti prasādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ kaścidupādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaśca- ityasminnarthe darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta ityāha /
T11dhnyabpu:5684: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca sādhyanivṛtau sādhananivṛttipradarśakatvam- ityetad vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya /
T11dhnyabpu:5686: etenaiva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntabhāsāḥ kathitā bhavanti /
T11dhnyabpu:5687: tathā hi- pūrviktisiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakārya sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmarthyāduktaṃ bhavati // 123 //
T11dhnyabpu:5701: yathā- yo vaktā sa rāgādimān iṣṭapuruṣavat /
T11dhnyabpu:5717: tena tatra vacanarāgādayorvyāpyavyapakabhavaḥ kārya kāraṇabhāvo vā naiva vidyate /
T11dhnyabpu:5718: anitya iti / ihānvayo vidyamāno 'pi na pradarśitaḥ // 126 //
T11dhnyabpu:5729: tathā sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5742: tadubhayamapi rathyāpuruṣe dṛṣṭānte sandigdham- asarvajñatvaṃ rāgādimatvaṃ ceti // 125 //
T11dhnyabpu:5746: apradarśitānvayaśca yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'pyanvayo na pradarśito vaktrā,
T11dhnyabpu:5754: anvayo viparīto yasmin dṛṣṭānte iti vigrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5756: iha yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iryāmadheye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakam iti viparītābhidhānam // 127 //
T11dhnyabpu:5772: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tadani tyam iti kṛtakatvamanityatve niyatamabhidhāya niyamasadhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5776: na ca sādharmyāt sādhyasiddhirato 'nvayārtho dṛṣṭāntastadarthaścānena nopāttaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5779: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭāṃ vastu,
T11dhnyabpu:5781: tathā viparīto 'nvayo yasmin dṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5789: tathāhi- yadanityamityanityatvamanūdaya tat kṛtakamiti kṛtakatvaṃ vihitam /
T11dhnyabpu:5809: te ca yatra santi te sādhyādyavaytirekiṇah /
T11dhnyabpu:5823: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāvamūrtatve paramāṇuvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī nityatvāt paramāṇūnām karma sādhanāvyatireki /
T11dhnyabpu:5840: āptatā ca tayorliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇatiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣo 'vidayamānaḥ sarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo yasmin tathoktaṃ śāsanam
T11dhnyabpu:5841: tādṛśaṃ śāsanaṃ teṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ teṣāṃ bhāvastattvam /
T11dhnyabpu:5844: atra vaidharmyodaharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikamupadiṣṭavān /
T11dhnyabpu:5847: 131 sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā- na trayīvidā rāmhaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvaditi /
T11dhnyabpu:5856: tasmāt te sarvajñā vītarāgā veti niścetuṃ śakyata iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5862: hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āptā vā syuḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5867: vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptataliṅgabhūtamupadiṣṭāvān /
T11dhnyabpu:5868: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaśca tāvādī yasya sa ṛṣabhvardhamānādirdigambarāṇāṃ śāstā sarvajñaśca āptaśceti /
T11dhnyabpu:5869: tadiha vaidharmyodāharaṇam ṛṣabhāderasarvajñatvasyanāptatayāśca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
T11dhnyabpu:5878: tena na grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yasyeti sādhyam /
T11dhnyabpu:5882: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvena yatra vyāpto darśyate tad vaidharyodaharaṇam /
T11dhnyabpu:5883: grāhyaṃ vacanaṃ yeṣāṃ te grāhyavacanā iti sādhyanivṛttimanūdaya na te rāgādimanta iti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5884: gauramaraṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5889: atra vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgrahaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:5898: tenatadukta bhavati- trayīvid yo brāmhaṇastadabhimatapuruṣavacanaṃ nityapramāṇaṃ nāstīti /
T11dhnyabpu:5901: ye hi grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5903: gautama vyāsamuniprabhṛttibhiryāni dharmaśāstrāṇi praṇītāniv tāni hi trayīvidāṃ prāmāṇyavacanāni /
T11dhnyabpu:5911: ādiryeṣāṃ te tathoktā manbādayo dharmaśāstrāṇi= smṛtayasteṣāṃ kartāraḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5912: trayīvidā hi brāmhaṇena grāhyavacanā dharmaśāstrakṛto vītarāgāśca ta ītīha dharmī vyatirekaviṣayo gautamādaya iti /
T11dhnyabpu:5923: svīkārādūrdhva yad gārdhya mātsarya sa āgrahaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5924: parigrahaśca āgrahaśca tabhyāṃ yogāt kapilādayo labhyamānaṃ svīkurvanti svīkṛtaṃ na muñcanti- iti te rāgādimanto gamyante /
T11dhnyabpu:5925: atra pramāṇe vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yatra sāhdyābhāva sādhanābhavo darśayitavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5927: sādhyābhāvamanūdaya na tasya parigrahāgrahāviti sādhanābhavo vihitaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5929: etasmād ṛṣabhādedṛṣṭāntād avītarāgatvasya sādhyaparigrahāgrahayogasya ca sādhanasya nivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /
T11dhnyabpu:5932: vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam- yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā /
T11dhnyabpu:5934: yadayapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtaṃ tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddheravyatirekaḥ //
T11dhnyabpu:5937: ṛṣabhādayo hi svalpamatramapi vyañjanaṃ na parigṛhṇanti /
T11dhnyabpu:5944: te ca sarve mānasattvāt indriyagocarā na bhavanti /
T11dhnyabpu:5945: tasmāt ṛṣabhādibhyo vyāvṛttireveti niścetuṃ na śakyate // 132 //
T11dhnyabpu:5953: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptirasiddhā /
T11dhnyabpu:5959: yadi nāma tatsiddhānte vītarāgāśca niṣparigrahāśca paṭhayante,
T11dhnyabpu:5961: aparānapi trīnudāhartumāha- avyatireka it avidyamāno vyatireko yasmin so 'vyatirekaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5972: yadyapi upalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyavṛttam- sarāgatvaṃ vītarāgatvaṃ ca tathāpi vyaptyā vyatireko yastasyasiddheḥ kāraṇādavyatireko 'yam /
T11dhnyabpu:5987: tathāhi yadi ye ye ca apdārthā nityāḥ te sarva evākṛtakāḥ ityucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:5996: sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa tāvad yathā prakāśitastathā na yuktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:5999: ato vakturaparādhādapi parāthānumāne heturdṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭāḥ syādapi /
T11dhnyabpu:6010: vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ na ca tathopanyasta iti ayamapradarśitavyatireko vakturaparādhād duṣṭāḥ // 134 //
T11dhnyabpu:6011: viparīto vyatireko yasmin vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte sa tathoktaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:6015: tadā vyatirekavākye sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato darśayitavyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:6016: evaṃ hi hetuḥ sādhyaniyato darśitaḥ syāt /
T11dhnyabpu:6017: yadi tu sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato nākhyāyate,
T11dhnyabpu:6019: tathā ca sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ na pratīyeta /
T11dhnyabpu:6021: viparītavyatireke ca sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyābhāve niyata ucyate,
T11dhnyabpu:6027: tathā ca sati akṛtakatvaṃ nityatve sādhyābhāve niyatamuktam,
T11dhnyabpu:6030: 136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
T11dhnyabpu:6036: taiśca dṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoyacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tadapi viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ tacca na śakyate darśayitum /
T11dhnyabpu:6037: tata eva te dṛṣṭāntābhāsā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:6038: yasmād dvividhamapi hetirlakṣaṇaṃ darśayituṃ na śakyate,
T11dhnyabpu:6047: yena vacanena dosā uddhriyante tad dūṣaṇamiti /
T11dhnyabpu:6052: ebhiśca hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe ca sarvatrāsattvameva yat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tat niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
T11dhnyabpu:6069: 138 ye pūrva nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt //
T11dhnyabpu:6074: yasmāttena vacanena pūrvapakṣiṇā sādhayitumiṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ pratibadhyate,
T11dhnyabpu:6082: yaiśca vacanaiḥ sādhanadoṣā abidhyamānā api udbhāvyante tāni jātayo veditavyāḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:6084: ucyate, dūṣaṇānāṃ tayā dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ ca nirūpaṇe samyagjñānamapi sasahāyaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavatoti /
T11dhnyabpu:6085: tathā caitā hyatra dūṣaṇā iti tāsāṃ pariharo vidheyaḥ /
T11dhnyabpu:6090: dūṣaṇaṃ vivarītumāha- ye pūrva nyūnatādayo 'siddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktāḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:6094: ityāha- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣāmiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ,
T11dhnyabpu:6097: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhānniścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ityastyeva viparyayasiddhiriti // 138 //
T11dhnyabpu:6110: pṛthu yaccājitaṃ puṇyaṃ nyāyabidoḥ padaṃ padam /
T11dhnyabpu:6127: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hayavadat /
T11dhnyabpu:6128: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
